bond_Fatima-Betrorum_1.text: Back during Comic Marche 94...
Thanks for waiting~
Doujin gathering operation, complete!
Mai presents the bag of doujinshi to Al-Abdullah.
This... should be everything. Here, for the lady.
...Thank you.
I will make sure... to give these to my daughter personally.
Okay... I'm sure she'll like them...
How could I ever repay the great kindness you three have shown me...
Is there anything I can grant you?
Mai, Sitara and Ginny glance at each other.
Eh? Hmm... I dunno.
That's not really what we collected them for.
If she can read the books... and feel happy...
Then... that would be our best reward.
Fatima reminisces about those events, and Mai's kindness.
Fatima: Back then, at that very moment, my life was indeed saved by you.
Fatima: And thus...
Fatima: I wished to see them, the colors you drape the world in.
Fatima: I wished to hear them, the harmonies you spread across the lands.
Fatima: If someday, in your own words, you might describe your world to me...
Restaurant "Camellia"
One day, not long after Fatima transferred into Touin High, she and Tri-Stella☆ visit a family restaurant after school.
Now, what am I gonna have?
Sitara is staring at something through the restaurant's windows.
Mmm...
Hey... You guys see those people looking at us from across the street? Are those...
They're your bodyguards, aren't they, Fatima?
I... suppose they are.
I had advised them subtly not to disrupt your moods beforehand.
But, alas...
Well, that's not really an easy thing to solve anyways.
I think they're already doing the best they can.
They don't have a problem at all with us being near you.
Of course.
I do, quite literally, owe my life to all of you.
Yes, and in addition... I had taken the liberty to browse records of your exploits.
...Records?
Indeed.
Ginny, thinking that Fatima is hinting at something disagreeable, gives her a stern look.
I may have implied otherwise, but said records were in fact ones that are publically available.
Ginny drops the hostile attitude, and Sitara giggles at her.
Of what I saw, Mai's exploits were expecially touching to me.
Well... In particular, the ballet videos from her primary school period.
Mai reacts poorly to what Fatima says...
Dance has a way of communicating meanings even without the aid of language.
The citizens of my country all felt a sense of nobility from her dancing figure.
Mai shrinks even more at those words, and Ginny starts to take notice...
So much so that some, including my father,
are proposing to declare her birthday as a national holiday.
Oh god, for real!?
That seems...
Though, worry not, I did warn them that, should they wish to do such a thing,
Fatima turns to Mai, not noticing her gradually worsening mental state.
they should obtain consent from Mai herself first.
Ahaha... You can say that again.
What are your thoughts on this, Mai?
Regarding the plans to declare your birthday as an Alf-Laylan national holiday, the "Day of the Noble Saintess".
Huh? Ah... Huh. I-I see... I see.
Yeah, true. Sorry. Yeah, I'm sorry.
Umm... Sorry. I'm fine. Sorry.
Ahaha... I'm sorry. Y-you're right.
Uh, I have something... to do later.
S-sorry, but... I have to, uhm, leave now.
T-the bill... right... I'll um, leave the money here.
Sorry. See you later.
Mai bolts out of the restaurant's doors, to everyone's astonishment.
Mai!
Tama-chan...
Virginia calmly turns to the still-surprised Fatima, giving her an accusatory glare.

bond_Fatima-Betrorum_2.text: Sometime after the restaurant incident, Mai finds herself trapped in another panic attack...
Mai: I had a normal... No, a blessed childhood, probably...
Mai: My dad is a leading dance choreographer. My mom is a famous competitive dancer.
Mai: They're kind, fair, gentle. People I can respect from the bottom of my heart.
Her mind conjures up a version of what seems to be a childhood episode...
"Hey, you're a staff member, right? Shouldn't you be h̷e̶l̴p̴i̵n̸g̴ the girl?"
"A̵w̸w̸, don't let her f̸i̷n̷d̷ ̸o̴u̷t̴, I'll start f̶e̵e̷l̷i̸n̶g̴ ̷b̶a̵d̴."
The cacophony of laughter becomes all-consuming and makes her nauseous...
Mai: *sigh*... Look at me, feeling down from something so small. Always playing the victim...
Mai: "It's because you keep getting carried away, you piece of human garbage."
Mai's mind goes to her three friends, with her classroom as the backdrop.
But then, the thought of Fatima plunges her back into darkness...
Touin Academy General High School, Classroom 2-B
Sitara and Ginny come up from behind.
Honestly, that national holiday thing yesterday really came as a surprise.
But I do think you went a bit far with what you said back there, Ginny.
After you left, Ginny kinda got, y'know...
I know Fatima didn't mean anything bad, of course.
But like they say, the road to hell is paved with good intentions.

Sorry, you two...
...It's all my fault.
There's nothing you need to be sorry for, Mai.
Yeah, Tama-chan. Fatima told us she wants to apologize to you, too.
I hope we are all having a fine morning.
Mai. I must apologize for my impertinence yesterday.
It was not my intention to offend. Please accept my sincere apology.
I see now that I cannot belittle the importance of cultural norms, even while displaying gratitude.
I should have asked you what–
There's... nothing. I've done nothing. It's nothing.
You don't have to worry about me. You can forget about me.
Mai looks at her friends again, but she fails to recognize them. In her eyes, their faces are covered in a swirling dark mist.
Mai dashes out of the classroom...
Fatima motions to chase after Mai, but...
Mai: "What the hell are you doing...? At this rate..."
Mai: Sorry... I'm so sorry... I'm the one at fault here...
Mai: "Getting carried away again, you piece of trash?"
Her mind goes to Fatima again.
Mai: That... straight gaze... At me...
Mai: "No need to look at garbage like her. It's not good for your eyes."
Mai: "You owe her a debt? Ridiculous."
Mai: "She's so worthless, she may as well be dead."

bond_Fatima-Betrorum_3.text: Restaurant "Camellia"
Later, the group visits the same family restaurant again, without Mai. Fatima looks dejected, while Ginny is once again confrontational after the earlier events in the classroom.
Sitara, unable to bear the hostile atmosphere, tries to brighten the mood...
N-now, what am I gonna have~?
I guess~ It'll be~ Lasagna again~ ♪
But the two ignore her completely...
I... I had never intended to disrupt the harmony of the group.
Well, you sure did a great job of it there~
You see, about Mai...
Back when we first met, I thought she was really "strong".
..."Strong"?
Her posture was unnaturally good, and her movements were always perfectly symmetrical down the middle.
It gave off a sense of pressure, like something you'd expect from martial artists, or people along those lines.
But after watching her for a while, I realized. Apparently it was all from dancing.
She's just that good. I doubt she's ever stopped training, even now.
But, she's never said a single word about any of it.
Could be there's some kind of reason she doesn't want to touch on.
I don't know about the holiday thing,
but, maybe the thought of her childhood ballet dancing being seen by other people-
-made her feel uncomfortable?
Now that you mention it...
When I first met Tama-chan at school...
We had similar hobbies, so we kinda hit it off pretty quick.
But when I asked if I could call her "Mai"...
I dunno, it was like... her face clouded over.
Or, like, the air suddenly grew heavier by a few times...
Well, I came up with a nickname for her and dodged the topic real quick, but...
It kinda felt like... that was something I should never ever try to bring up.
...Yeah, I think I noticed it too.
Ah, that's not-
I wasn't trying to rail on you, Fatima.
Or maybe you were? It is partially her fault, right?
Hey- Ginny!
But Ginny stands by what she said...
Aren't you... being kinda weird too, Ginny?
I thought you were always kind.
Why are you, like... being so harsh on just Fatima?
The Ginny I know would be more, well, composed-
Y'know,
I'm not really as kind as you think.
And if I look composed at all,
that'd be because I'm looking down at everyone from a higher place.
Any fight you throw at me, I can win.
Any competition of Actress skills, I can win too.
Across this society as a whole, there's no one who can lay a finger on me.
The only reason why I might look composed to you would be because everyone's so beneath me, don't you think?
Ginny moves her gaze to Fatima.
But then... When it comes to Fatima...
When it comes to Fatima...!
Ginny snaps out of her anger.
S-sorry... I... What the hell did I just say...
Ginny...
Sitara...
Are you... disappointed with me now...?
...Huh?
Er, nonono... Not at all... Not one bit!
I-it happens. W-we all have days like... this.
...I'm gonna go. I need to cool my head.
Oh, right! I'm out of sparkling water. Wonder if I'll go buy some.
Sorry. I'll... see you two later.
Ginny leaves...
The fault for damaging the relationships within this group lies with-
O-of course not!
I guarantee you. There's... no way that's true.
It's just... Something's gotten a little off, that's all.
It's not... It's not anyone's fault.
But...
I'm scared...
We're all friends here. Probably... Definitely, for life.
So this much is nothing. If there's a misunderstanding, we can just leave that to time.
But, if...
What do I do... What should I do?
Sitara slowly breaks into tears...
Fatima... H-
Help me...
Fatima looks at the crying Sitara with sadness for a moment, then recomposes herself, resolving to fix everything...

bond_Fatima-Betrorum_4.text: <color=#ffffff>As I pursue the answer, it flees deep into obscurity.</color>
<color=#ffffff>I chase and chase, but unreachable it remains.</color>
Yet the chase compels me. I cannot bear to stop.
<color=#ffffff>Who are you taking away? How far will you go?</color>
<color=#ffffff>With your scathing talons and indomitable wings?</color>
The next day, at the office...
Ah, Commander.
Good morning. I hope you will not mind me being here.

commands.command: I see you're by yourself today.

items.text: Yes. I have come for an unappointed visit.
I do believe Virginia has a shift today, but...

commands.command: Beautiful as always, Your Highness.

items.text: I see... You can understand that I am not my usual self...
If so, those words must be to put me at ease...
That, I suppose, is one manifestation of the skill of leadership.
Thank you for the lesson.

bond_Fatima-Betrorum_4.text: Embarrassingly, the friendship between me and my friends...
Hmm... I wonder... Perhaps "a falling-out" would be an apt way to refer to it.
I am entirely to blame, for being unable to adjust myself to the group properly...
I have placed myself within touching distance of everyone,
and gained the ability to freely exchange words with them.
And yet, a conflict like this...
I am deeply ashamed of my lack of power.
At this rate...
No, I must not think that way. So long as we are all alive...
So long as I do not give up, new opportunities will always arise.
After all, a friendship cannot be lost as easily as a mere object.
Ginny enters the office.
Good mo-
Oh...
Good morning, Virginia.
Ah, well... Good morning.
Um... Well... See...
Perhaps we should "settle the score" at a time like this?
...Huh?
Er... "you're coming with me"?
Haha, you trying to take me to a back alley or something?
Right... Well, that's fine by me.
But what about company rules?
The Commander is watching us.
Indeed. Violence is never the answer.
Times like these call for dialogue.
Ooh... That seems like it'd totally do something.
Perfect, in that case.
Thank you, Commander.
I shall have Virginia "come with me" for a few moments.
Fatima leaves. Ginny watches her back and smiles for a moment, then follows behind her.
Fatima takes Ginny to a park...
I must apologize to you.
What's this about?
While we investigated everyone's backgrounds back in Alf-Layla,
I came to understand your past as well, Virginia,
to a certain degree.
Ah, that...
Well, I pretty much figured.
To be honest with you, I didn't really want anyone to find out.
That's why, well... I was so harsh on you back then.
I should be the one saying sorry.
Although... I have come to a conclusion after considering your words the other day.
That it is precisely because of your past that I am able to become someone special to you.
...Wow.
As I owe you my life, Virginia, my country owes you a debt as well.
That's hindsight. Really roundabout, at that.
From now on, I will strive to know you not from the information I was given,
but through my own actions.
...Go easy on me.
Sitara said this after you left on that day,
that all of us are friends for life.
Will you... become friends with me?
Given your position at the head of your country,
I dunno what people will say if you get too close to someone like me.
Then I will ignore them.
...Sure, then.
Here's to a good friendship.
Yes. I second that sentiment.
By the way...
Hm?
Would you happen to know of the "Condottiere"?
...Whoa, nononono.
You trying to make me jealous here!?
That was in jest.
Nah, I don't buy that for a second.
You definitely had the "trying something" look just now.
Heeheehee.
Hey, how about you tell me a weakness or two of your own, Fatima?
To keep things fair?
Hahahaha.
...I'll leave Mai and Sitara to you.
...Okay.

bond_Fatima-Betrorum_5.text: <color=#efefddff>Powerful feelings streak across the night sky, reaching and saving me in the distance.</color>

<color=#efefddff>Would you let me come closer
by half a step
by a single step
Though light-years set us apart?</color>

<color=#efefddff>Pure emotions dazzle like first-magnitude stars.
It was too bright to approach.</color>
<color=#efefddff>Thus, I averted my gaze.</color>

<color=#efefddff>Would you let me come closer
by half a step
by a single step
Though this star shines not on its own?</color>
<color=#efefddff>To you...</color>
A few days later, at Mai's residence...
Mai~ You have a guest~
O-okay~
A guest...? Not Sitara...?
Mai comes to the front door.
Hello. Please do excuse me for the sudden visit.
Fatima...
C-come in, for now...
Thank you, but it would be uncouth of me to intrude upon your household without prior notice.
Instead, would you accompany me for a short walk?
Huh... no... I...
...Sure.
The two walk along the riverbank.
This place has quite the view.
Fatima turns to Mai.
I feel that I had not properly conveyed my remorse for the events of the other day. Once again...
Allow me to apologize for everything. I-
Why are you apologizing...?
It was all my bad...
All because I'm so worthless...
All because I'm a piece of trash...
So why are you apologizing!
Well-
Mai speaks, but it is seemingly not her own voice...
<color=#9A9797FF>She doesn't have the right to have other people apologize to her...</color>
<color=#9A9797FF>She's evil, she's always been a betrayer, and she has no reason to be alive...!</color>
I wish to know more about you.
To connect with you, and through doing so, learn that which I cannot remain ignorant of.
Please, talk to me... Tell me what lies within your heart.
But, I'm...
<color=#9A9797FF>Just a good-for-nothing loser.</color>
<color=#9A9797FF>Just a piece of trash who can't get back up from the smallest of setbacks,</color>
<color=#9A9797FF>who betrayed the expectations of everyone around her, who troubles people wherever she goes, who keeps on running and hiding like a coward.</color>
<color=#9A9797FF>You can never hope to be understood. She'll just say "that's it?" and it'll be all over, end of story.</color>
She is my life's savior,
and you will not speak of her in such a way!
How I think of you, Mai, is for myself to decide.
<color=#9A9797FF>She's just going to get fed up and-</color>
I was!
I was... a lively girl. I loved ballet... I really did...!
I... was confident. I even... worked hard.
I had the talent... and a good environment too.
Among people of the same age, there was nobody who could rival me.
I could easily win a junior competition, even get podium at Nationals.
I was so happy, just to dance and see everyone smile...
...But, at some point, the more and harder I worked...
The more recognition I earned... The more those smiles disappeared from around me.
I was even bullied...
And by the time I noticed... I was all alone.
But even then, Mommy, Daddy, my teacher,
They stayed by my side all the same.
And I...  I betrayed them.
<color=#9A9797FF>You're unforgivable, for living such a carefree life after you've betrayed those who are important to you...</color>
<color=#9A9797FF>For being so weak, that something so insignificant shattered you piece by piece...!</color>
Fatima, your feelings, your hard work, they're... so blindingly bright.
I feel like I'd... break into pieces, just being beside you.
I am no better. I am always uttering rhetoric such as "for the nation" and "for our people".
Holding neither the power, nor the methods.
...Nor even a sense a self.
Do I still have the right to love you, being the hollow person that I am?
The feelings of people,
whether they be joy or sorrow,
are things to be defined and accepted by oneself.
They cannot simply be compared to those of others, nor can be they explained away in such a way.
That is what I believe.
Therefore...
Therefore, Mai, you never lost the right to accept gratitude and apology from others.
Not as long as I remain, not as long as I stand before you.
As the living testament to your heart, to your actions!
If insecurity is what torments you, then I shall continue to be the proof of your worth.
So, please... Be at ease, and share with me...
Share with me what you keep buried within you...
I just... wanted to be a help to them... Sitara... Ginny...
Fatima...
And Mutsumi, and Yotsuyu,
and Fumika, and the Commander,
and Rei, and Kaede, and Rin,
and Aika, and Ayaka,
and Miss Meika, and Miss Koyui, and Miss Yumi,
As Mai goes on, she begins to sob...
and Mommy, and Daddy...
That's... all... I ever wanted...
Mai pours her heart out in tears, and Fatima embraces her. The two remain like this for some time, underneath the blue sky...
The next day, at school...
Good morning, everyone.
Morning~
Good morning.
Mai peeks out from behind Fatima.
G-good morning...
Tama-chan... G'morning!
Ah, last night, did you two-
Ginny.
Huh? "Ginny"...? Whaaa?
Sitara turns to Ginny, who looks away.
Hey, what was that? What's going on here...?
Hahaha, that's a secret.
Now, now, that was quite unkind.
Yeah.
Eh? Wait... D-don't leave me out of this~
...*gasp*! Wait, maybe...
Since Tri-Stella's more like "Quad-Stella" now with Fatima here...
Are you planning to gimme the boot...!?
No, without you, Sitara, there can be no Tri-Stella.
Mhm, you're the leader.
Oh yeah, how about we go binge some anime at Sitara's place after school?
Grrrr... I'm not buyin' this...
Why do I feel like you're all thinking "there's no helping her"...
Hahaha, Sitara's pouting now.
Whaaatever! I'm gonna go grab Fumika and Yotsuyu,
and we're gonna form True Tri-Stella together~!
Everyone shares a laugh.
Fatima: Far away from my homeland, in the city of Tokyo, I obtained these invaluable and meaningful lifelong friendships.
Fatima: I do not view this happiness to be a betrayal to the people of my homeland.
Fatima: Instead, the feelings born within this chest will become a force to usher forth world peace.
Fatima: In this, I place my faith...

bond_Niiya-Serina_1.text:
The city that never sleeps:
Tokyo Shard.
The lights shine on forever downtown.
However... even if the city never sleeps, its people eventually do.
It is then, when the clock strikes twelve, that Chat Noir roams the night.
Minami Corporation · Office Floor
And on one such night, Serina infiltrates a company for evidence...
Transaction data, a second set of accounts, a secret contact list...
That should be enough!
Hmhm, I'm looking forward to tomorrow's news.
Good night... Minami Corporation.
The next day, on the news...
Here's our next story.
Early this morning, it was discovered that Minami Corporation, Tokyo Shard's largest general trading company, has been engaging in accounting fraud.
The leaked data suggests the existence of hidden company accounts, and includes evidence of fictitious trades and round-tripping.
This was confirmed by the data's origin: it was simultaneously sent to multiple media outlets and the SESC from within the company itself.
The culprit was initially believed to be an anonymous whistleblower, but Chat Noir claimed responsibility moments ago.
The published statement on the internet includes an additional list of bribes from the hidden accounts and their recipients,
which hints that it may be a while before the full picture of Minami's corporate crimes becomes clear.
Chat Noir, who has been exposing many crimes within Tokyo Shard...
...has claimed yet another for her record!
Based on the eyewitness testimonies delivered to us...
Chat Noir appears to be a woman.
But in the end... just who could it be under that mask?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Chat Noir sure is amazing.
I do find it admirable that she metes out justice to the scoundrels of society.
Hm, well... I'm not so sure, myself.
She may be doing good, but she is still trespassing, isn't she?
That's not exactly legal, you know?
Huh? Ah, true... It's not good to just sneak in willy-nilly.
But if she refrains from it, wouldn't the wrongdoings she has exposed remain hidden?
You're right, of course.
It's just, as a member of society, I can't exactly happily condone someone breaking into companies...
I see. I'm impressed!
Miss Serina, how mature of you!
Though it is a crime, since information isn't property, it wouldn't qualify as theft.
In Chat Noir's case, if they want to bring her to court, she'd be charged with breaking and entering at most.
You know a lot about this stuff.
Eh? W-Well...
Working adults generally know these things, yes.
What kind of person do you think Chat Noir is?
I wonder if maybe she's actually someone I know pretty well.
Eh!?
You know Chat Noir personally, Yotsuyu?
Nah, I mean, I just thought it'd be cool if Chat Noir was the person I looked up to.
The person you look up to?
I'm talking about the lady who helped me out when I was young. I really owe her.
Either way, I'm sure Chat Noir's fighting to help people.
Haha. Perhaps? I do hope that's the case.
Having thought upon it... wouldn't you say Chat Noir is a righteous person–
who judges the evils of Tokyo Shard society–
and holds a strong conviction to reform this world?
Ohhhhhh! That sounds so cool!
That might be a little overboard... I wouldn't know.
Miss Serina, what type of person do you think Chat Noir is?
M-me? Let me think...
A mysterious and cool femme fatale...
I think I'd like that.
Hmmmmm...
Hmmmmm...
Did I say something odd?
My image of her is different... Like, sure, she's probably pretty, but she could also be kind and cheerful in nature.
Why do you think that?
It's just a little hope I have. Like, "wouldn't that be nice?" kind of.
Ah– Personally, I believe that Chat Noir is a dignified young girl with a clear idea of what her beliefs of justice are.
I-is that so?
A young girl's the furthest thing from what I could be at this point...
Serina turns to you.
What do you think, Commander?

commands.command: Chat Noir is here among us.

items.text: Eh?
Really?
Chat Noir is within our group...

commands.command: To tell the truth, I'm Chat Noir.

items.text: That... seems unlikely.
That can't be true...
I... find that a little off-putting.

bond_Niiya-Serina_1.text: Commander! Give it a rest with the jokes for once!
We were all... thinking about it so seriously, too...
You were... joking?
Hmph! That I cannot forgive, even from you, Commander.
Yotsuyu and Kaede leave...
Here's our next story.
Higashimaru Real Estate has recently come under suspicion of violating the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
Though a suspected whistleblower leak highlighted the possibility of the company possessing suspicious data, said data was nowhere to be found upon investigation...
My next job has been decided for me.

bond_Niiya-Serina_2.text: Higashimaru Real Estate Office
Chat Noir infiltrates her mark...

Protection layer four...
Protection layer five...
...I'm in.
Broker fraud data, monopolized property listings, accounting fraud data...
With this... the evidence of Higashimaru's malfeasance is now secure.
I'm looking forward to the news tomorrow. Fufufuu...
That's right... I should report this data to the authorites as well, not just the media.
But suddenly, the alarm sounds...
A decoy file!? I got careless!
Chat Noir makes her escape.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
The next day...
*yawn*...
Yesterday evening was a blunder...
I wonder if Kaede and Yotsuyu's praises went to my head.
Good morning.
Yotsuyu and Kaede acknowledge Serina's presence, then go back to focusing on something.
What are the two of you staring so eagerly at?
Next up on the program... At last, Chat Noir's true identity is coming closer to being revealed.
First of all, please turn your attention to this image.
If you would.
What's that? An anime?
Could this black silhouette be that of Chat Noir?
I see, they must've made an anime of her! 'Cause she's so popular.
"Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir"!?
Miss Serina, are you acquainted with this work?
Well, it was a popular show that aired when I was a child.
That's right, it's "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir".
It's a smash hit animated kids' show from twenty years ago.
In it, an ordinary girl transforms into Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir!
And with her skills, she elegantly liberates the wealth of evildoers,
returns them to the good people who fell victim to deceit,
and lends a hand to people in need.
Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir is a phantom thief of justice.
Though I suppose the kids nowadays might not know about her~?
She was very popular back in my day.
No girl in her twenties wouldn't know about her, right?
I even got to star as a guest voice actor for the show once upon a time~
At any rate, this animated show, "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir",
and the hot topic of Tokyo Shard, Chat Noir... What kind of connection do they have, you may ask?
First of all, this costume!
From the various eyewitness accounts we have to the footage from security cameras and vehicle cameras,
it's clear that this Chat Noir greatly resembles her character counterpart from the show.
Chat Noir is undoubtedly a woman in her twenties!
Eek!!
Wh-what's up?
Pardon me... is something the matter?
N-no... Not at all...

Chat Noir is a woman in her twenties!
...Well, probably.
Since they are covered by a full-body suit, they could very well be a man in disguise...
But if possible... I'd rather they be a girl.
Due to the media attention on Chat Noir's deeds, there's been a clear rise in whistleblowing incidents on corporate crimes.
It seems that the number of whistleblowing reports in the past several months has surpassed the total for all of last year.
This phenomenon isn't just affecting Tokyo Shard–it's spreading to other Shards as well.
Anonymous individuals are using Chat Noir–esque usernames to participate in whistleblowing activities.
"Chat Noir Saitama", "Naniwa Chat Noir", "Chat Noir in Setouchi"...
Local Chat Noirs are being identified in every corner of Japan.
Just how long will this "Chat Noir Phenomenon" last?
That's all for now. This has been Usamoto Anna, reporting in.
Please stay tuned for updates.
That's amazing. Check out how famous Chat Noir is.
It does feel a little perplexing.
Eh, how come? Isn't that good?
This is so unexpected. I don't know how to feel about it...
One good deed leads to another, and society gets brighter. It's a wonderful thing!
Hmm... I don't know.
There is a good saying for this situation. "A crow blends into the night, and a white heron the snow."
Is it truly such a good thing to bring Chat Noir from the darkness into the light?
You're overthinking it, Kaede.
I suppose I am.
You are right in that good deeds deserve to be commended, Yotsuyu.
Bringing Chat Noir from the darkness into the light...!?
This is no time for perplexion or celebration.
I can't let a debacle like last night's happen a second time...
I've got to be more careful than ever...
Later...
News flash! This just in!
The identity of Chat Noir, who has uncovered many evil deeds up until now, has been confirmed.

bond_Niiya-Serina_3.text: News flash! This just in!
The identity of Chat Noir, who has uncovered many evil deeds up until now, has been confirmed.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
They've found out who Chat Noir is!?
No way...
But should we be rejoicing?
There must have been a reason for Chat Noir to wear a disguise...
We have footage capturing a critical moment.
If you would.
The news program airs a recording of a... slightly different version of what happened a previous night...
Broker fraud data, monopolized property listings, accounting fraud data mixed in...
With this... the media and the public's desired malfeasance is now secure.
I'm looking forward to their stock price tomorrow. Fufufuu...
That's right... I should request the bill from the rival companies as well, to secure my payment.
The preceding footage, captured only days ago, is a recording of Chat Noir's trespass at the Higashimaru Real Estate office.
Chat Noir's true guise was...
...that of a money-grubber who infiltrates companies to plant forged data and accuse them of nonexistent crimes.
It was all... just a lie.
Just about everything was for her own sake...
That's unforgivable!
You were right, Miss Serina.
Eh?
Chat Noir is a trespassing criminal...
A despicable thief who assumed the guise of justice for the sake of their own greed.
I had thought of her as a righteous individual, fighting the evils of the world...
I am deeply ashamed of my own naïveté.
That was... the other day at Higashimaru Real Estate.
Was I... secretly filmed!?
To think that they could frame Chat Noir by editing my voice like this...
I let my guard down.
The news program continues.
We've invited a special guest to our program today.
Please welcome the counter-spy specialist hired by Higashimaru for this incident.
Raiya descends from above onto Anna's anchor desk, to the latter's surprise.
Greetings! I'm Kaeruzaka Raiya!
P-please don't stand on the desk...
Raiya gets off the desk and stands next to Anna.
You're awfully young for a security expert.
Ah, yes. I may be young, but I am indeed an expert.
I make full use of Urban-Style Ninjutsu to protect corporate information and reputation.
Then, let's get right into our questions. How was this footage shot?
Right, right! It sure wasn't easy~

But, in the end~
I settled on Urban-Style Ninjutsu's Mirror Recording Technique.
The Mirror Recording Technique! What sort of ninjutsu is that?
It's a trap I lay onto the PCs of targeted businesses in advance.
Ninjutsu on a computer! Is that possible!? How did you apply the technique onto a device?
Weeell, to tell the truth~ it's just a little somethin' you can download from the Urban-style Ninjutsu official site!
Then, you place the trap, and any would-be trespassers get captured perfectly by the PCs!
And on whichever device was accessed: a record of the half-wit spy trying to steal your data...
And that's Urban-Style Ninjutsu's Mirror Recording Technique!
Right now, the monthly subscription fee is a mere two thousand yen!
This special offer only lasts through the next half-hour after this program.
Advertising without permission is no-good-at-all!
Raiya walks right up to the camera.
Chat Noir! Give up your thieving ways right this instant! Or else I, Raiya, will capture you!
Leave it all to Urban-Style Ninjutsu!
Kaeruzaka Raiya... A cunning opponent.
That Chat Noir was a bad guy all along... I totally misjudged her.
I really hope she gets caught by Raiya!
If Chat Noir is an underhanded scoundrel who dares to cheat justice...
...then divine punishment shall certainly descend upon her.
I'm sure getting a lot of hate.
Higashimaru Real Estate, mark my words...
Chat Noir will expose every last one of your evil deeds.

bond_Niiya-Serina_4.text: Downtown
A few nights later, you and an excited Yotsuyu are in a hurry to somewhere...
Commander, Higashimaru Real Estate's this way.
If we don't hurry, we're gonna miss the moment of Chat Noir's arrest.
Later that night...
This is Usamoto! I'm reporting live from the vicinity of Higashimaru Real Estate's headquarters.
Chat Noir has issued a notice proclaiming that "an evil deed of great significance shall be revealed tonight"...
We are here right now to witness that important moment.
A huge crowd has gathered for the same reason, and the scene is currently rather chaotic.
Meanwhile, the Higashimaru Real Estate building is under heavy guard.
We have an exclusive interview with the on-scene security expert. Let's hear it again from Kaeruzaka Raiya.
Hello! Kaeruzaka Raiya here!
Our security is perfect! Not even a single frog... no! Not a single cat shall pass!
Heh heh heh. Tonight marks the end for Chat Noir!
But suddenly...
Wait, wait! That one's a faaaaaaake!
Anna and Raiya look around for the source of the voice, as another Raiya descends from above.
Aieeeee...! Why...!? Why me...
What the... Two Raiyas!? Just what could be going on here!?
That one's Chat Noir in disguiiiise!! Seize herrrr!
Huuuh!? You're the fake one here!
This has become a real pickle!
Which one's the real thing!?
I've got iiit! This is 3D projection mapping!
I see all! Right there~!
A flash, and Raiya's doppelganger is exposed and defeated.
Gwaaah! I've-been-found-out–
The fake Raiya fades away.
Raiya, what just...
That was a cloning technique using ultracompact projection tech.
Misusing Urban-Style Ninjutsu... Chat Noir, you scoundrel.
Unforgivable! I'll definitely capture you!
Observation Deck
Meanwhile, inside the Higashimaru building...
Heehee~ That official website sells some very handy things.
Fight ninjutsu with ninjutsu... My apologies for out-ninja-ing you.
Now, then... Out comes the president's car.
Why don't you guide me to where your secret account ledgers actually are...
Chat Noir tails the car...
Higashimaru Real Estate · President's Condo
...and arrives at the company president's house.
Since you tricked someone else, I'm sure you won't mind when the same happens to you.
Mr. Crooked President of Higashimaru Real Estate.
I'll pay you back in full for staining Chat Noir's name with your secret recording and synthesized speech.
Chat Noir finishes her work on the President's computer.
Heehee~ I'm looking forward to the news tomorrow.
News that you'll be taking center stage in, Mr. Crooked President.
Downtown
Having successfully accomplished her objective, Chat Noir runs through the nighttime streets.
However, a creeping white shadow chases behind her.
Ah–!
I'm being tailed!
Chat Noir continues running...
Observation Deck
I still can't shake them off!?
This pursuer... Kaeruzaka Raiya?
That's preposterous! That kid couldn't have gone anywhere in all that commotion...
But if not her... then who?
Heehee. That's fine... I'll just see for myself.
Tokyo Bay · Wharf
Chat Noir leads her pursuer to the waterfront...
Who are you? What kind of business do you have with me?
Masked Shana is your opponent!
Chat Noir! Do prepare yourself!
Suddenly, a mysterious masked figure materializes! What will Chat Noir's fate be!?

bond_Niiya-Serina_5.text: Tokyo Bay · Wharf
Who are you? What kind of business do you have with me?
Masked Shana is your opponent!
Chat Noir! Do prepare yourself!
Masked Shana? You're that wandering swordswoman of justice–
–who's been slaying villains night after night in Tokyo Shard.
Masked Shana is a swordswoman of justice!
Evil... shall taste my blade.
The time has come for our showdown, Chat Noir!
Oh, no... I've got no reason to fight you...
You may have no reason to fight, but as for me...
I have reason enough to strike you down.
For your crimes of trespassing;
for being a cowardly thief, who assumes the guise of justice for greed;
for those sins... I shall now cut you down!
Sei!
Hyah...!!
No... Not yet... I...
Masked Shana cut down Chat Noir with just one stroke.
Such a pity...
Chat Noir, you were also a just person who fought against evil. Or so I believed...
Suddenly, Chat Noir appears behind Masked Shana...?
Heehee...
Over here, Masked Shana.
There are... two Chat Noirs!?
Ah! This is the same trick you pulled against Kaeruzaka...
An ultracompact clone projector.
This Urban-Style Ninjutsu's pretty convenient, isn't it.
Are you not ashamed of stealing from others?!
Chat Noir only steals intelligence on evil deeds.
I paid properly for this ninjutsu.
So long, Masked Shana. May we meet again, someday, somewhere.
Halt! Chat Noir!
Send my best regards to young Raiya.
Chat Noir escapes.
Chat Noir... Someday, I will be sure to strike you down.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
–Next Morning–
*yawn*... We ended up missing Chat Noir's dramatic arrest~
It's 'cause you got us lost, Commander.
Chat Noir is still at large, in any case.
That's right! I had such high hopes for Raiya, too...
It's unfortunate... I failed to seal her fate at the last moment.
Eeh! Kaede, did you also go over there to gawk?
I had fallen behind in my negligence.
You could've invited me along with you~
Yotsuyu, you were with the Commander, right?
Is that true?
Thanks to the Commander here, we were stuck in this cramped little back alley.
It's sad, but he can't run through there as smooth as a cat.
I believe that is usually the case.
I can do it, though.
Otherwise, I wouldn't be able to catch Chat Noir.
I see... I shall practice as well.
Let's practice together and catch Chat Noir!
By our own hands!
Th–that's right! There might be more on the Chat Noir matter in the news.
It's time for a news update.
It has been only one night since yesterday evening's uproar at Higashimaru Real Estate, but just earlier this morning,
data proving numerous counts of fraud was leaked from the secondary residence of the company's president.
At first, it was thought to be another case of Chat Noir's malicious data forging,
but one shocking video was included in the leak-
-of the president editing security footage of her past infiltration.
Suspicion has arisen that he was trying to pin the blame for his own crimes on Chat Noir.
The Tokyo Metropolitan Police are suspecting an aggravated breach of trust and are planning to search the residence later today for evidence preservation purposes.
Kaeruzaka Raiya, as the security officer who recorded the footage of Chat Noir, made the following comments:

"I gave the video files to the company."
"I didn't watch the footage myself."
"The company disposed of it afterwards."
After those comments, she left one more brief statement:
"How suspicious..." she said, offering no additional comments afterwards.
It seems that Higashimaru Real Estate was using not just Chat Noir, but Raiya, as well.
That's all for now. This has been Usamoto Anna, reporting live.
Fwah! What's this supposed to mean?
Chat Noir wasn't a bad person after all!?
Does that mean that rotten president fooled us all?
Well? Who can say, huh? Heehee.
I... nearly committed a most terrible crime...
Kaede, that's a little over the top.
Everyone was tricked, so there's no need to blame yourself so much!
No, there is. One who walks the path of the sword in the name of justice must never make such a mistake.
I cannot forgive myself for not seeing through to the truth.
Kaede motions to leave the room.
Kaede, where are you going?
To train. I must discipline my unskilled self again, from the beginning.
Pardon me.
Kaede, hold on! I'm coming with you!
Kaede leaves, and Yotsuyu chases behind her.
They sure are earnest, those two...
While it's true that the president composited that voice into the Chat Noir footage...
The scene of him actually forging the data... That couldn't possibly have gotten caught on video, right?
I just added a synthesized voice to the video I took of the fraudulent data being hurriedly deleted.
That's just my... well, Chat Noir's style. I hope you understand.
Serina notices you.
Eeek!
...Commander!?
Ah, um... How long have you been over there?
Did you... hear what I just said?

commands.command: I never thought you were Chat Noir, Serina!

items.text: Keep your voice down, Commander.
I must ask you to keep this matter a secret.

commands.command: ...Guess it can't be helped.

items.text: Thank you so much!
It seems that Chat Noir won't need to expose any of your evil deeds after all.
...Heehee. It's just a joke, don't worry.

commands.command: I don't want to interfere with your personal life.

items.text: I'll never be complicit in any evil act, Commander. You have my word.
Evil is a force that runs rampant in our society.
Even if the city seems peaceful, even if the company seems upright, there will always be evil deeds happening under the surface.
I can't just sit by and let that happen.
If we keep on pretending not to see, it would only lead to even bigger disasters.
And the completely unrelated good people become victims.

commands.command: Nope, I didn't hear nothin'!

items.text: Thank you, Commander.
For having faith in me, and letting me go.
I'll... put my faith into you as well, Commander.

bond_Niiya-Serina_5.text: Maybe, you've noticed who I was... since the very beginning?
It's like... you see through everything that goes on here.
That's the kind of feeling I get.
...I don't know.
How long have I been imagining this for?
That maybe, I... actually wanted to be found out all along...
...Never mind. Just forget about it, please.
Um... I'm really glad I met you, Commander.

bond_Nikotama-Mai_1.text: Downtown
Ah, Commander!
Fancy meeting you in a place like this.
Oh, hey, I didn't think you'd be interested in ballet, too.
A famous ballet dancer from Moscow Shard is visiting right now.
It's... the farewell performance of that prima ballerina...
I've... looked up to her since I was young.
I'm on the way to that show right now...
Ah... Sitara and Ginny are... not going with me.
Yeah, Mai can be surprisingly clumsy sometimes.
We're here to take her to the National Theatre so she doesn't get lost on the way.
I mean... I'll be fine. I'm not a lost little kitten or anything.
You say that...
But remember how you went the exact opposite direction after leaving the subway station?
Aaah! I only forgot for a moment which way to...
Sitara looks at the time.
Crap, we don't got time to talk with the Commander right now!
Tama-chan, hurry! Not much longer until the opening!
Oh, right.
An alert pops up on everyone's phones.
Oh, crap! We've got a job.
Looks like some other company didn't manage to take this one down.
Mmmngh, goes to show how big this case is.

So a powerful Vice takes the stage this time.
...I'm fired up now!
Then uh, we should go get ready, too...
You can sit this one out, Tama-chan.
Go use that ticket of yours. It'd be sad to see it wasted.
Just leave this to your good pals Sitara and Ginny right here.
Let's go, Ginny!
You got it!
Sitara and Ginny run off to the mission...
Sitara... Ginny...
Commander, what should I do...?

commands.command: That's your own decision to make.

items.text: Y-you're right...
I can't just leave my own choices to other people...

commands.command: I could go to the show in your place.

items.text: I-it'd be bad... if you weren't commanding the mission, Commander...
And... even if I can't go see it,
I can keep this ticket... as a souvenir.

bond_Nikotama-Mai_1.text: U-umm... Actually... I think... I'll go on the sortie too.
Missing the farewell performance would be unfortunate, but...
I'll... prioritize the mission.
I do like ballet, but...
To me... the time I spend with my two friends is... irreplaceable.
Sitara! Ginny! Wait for me-!
Mai chases after her two friends.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Phew. Mission complete. Good work all~.
We tried to take care of it as fast as we could, but...
Just as I feared, I don't think we can make it to the show at this point.
Don't give up! There's one more card we can play!
If we zoom over to the theatre in our full Gear...
We'll get caught for sure. And then, from our Director... a scolding of the century.
It's okay... I'll just watch a video of it later.
And I still have this ticket to commemorate the day.
...as Mai notices something on the ticket.
She turns around and tries to hide her discovery.
Hold up! What was that obviously suspicious move just now?
I-it's nothing. Come on, let's go home.
Ginny sneaks up behind her and snatches the ticket out of her hands.
Aaaaand yoink.
Aaaah! Don't look-!
Sitara and Ginny inspect the ticket together.
Hm... Wait! This ticket–!?
The date of the show is tomorrow?
L-looks like it. I'm sorry.
Alllll right! If that's how it is, we three shall game the night away tonight!
We'll oversleep tomorrow for sure.
A small price to pay!
Spare me~!

bond_Nikotama-Mai_2.text: Downtown
Ah! C-Commander... H-hello...
Wh-what to do... er... umm...
I-I was... on my way back from the b-bookstore, and...
I-I wasn't sure if I should... talk about this with you...
B-but, I've steeled myself... so I will...
I-I uh, I saw something...
Umm... Well... Ginny is... chasing after someone's fanny...
Ah, no, I mean, a girl...
She was passing through... the street just over there...
Umm, so, in short.
Ginny was stalking a girl in secret.
And I can't help but be c-curious of what I saw.

commands.command: Let's go see what this is about.

items.text: Eeeeh!? But that's so bold!
I-it is the surest way though...

commands.command: Are you trying to get into the way of her love?

items.text: H-her love...?
So it's really true!?
I never thought Ginny of all people...
B-but, I'm not trying to get into her way or anything...
Rather, I'd love to, well, support her...

bond_Nikotama-Mai_2.text: Then, I-I'll...
I'll... follow behind you, Commander...
It's about Ginny... I have to make sure...
I have to... cheer her on, and help her feelings bear fruit.
A shopping mall.
You and Mai find Ginny at a mall.
Th-there... It's Ginny! She's right over there.
Tsk, lost her...
Ginny turns around.
Oh? Commander and... Mai?
Now that's a pair I don't see very often.
And what about you, Ginny? What are you doing at...
Damnit, she's noticed me, she's coming this way.
I gotta hide for a bit, Commander. C'mon Mai, you too.
Eh? Huh!?
Ginny drags Mai away as the former's mark comes up to you.
Вы что-то хотели? (Can I help you?)

commands.command: Please speak in a language we can understand.

items.text: This person is... weird.
The lady leaves.
Phew. Thanks for the save, Commander.

commands.command: Ничего, пожалуйста, оставь нас.

items.text: The lady obliges.
Whoa! Commander, I didn't know you could speak Russian!
What did he just say?
It translates into something like "nothing, please leave us."

bond_Nikotama-Mai_2.text: Uh, erm... So, what was that just now?
I was tailing her.
T-tailing...!?
Just a joke, don't take it to heart.
She looked like an old acquaintance of mine back in Moscow Shard.
So I was debating whether or not to call out to her, but turns out I got the wrong person...
So I panicked and hid.
S-so that's what it was... I misunderstood the whole thing.
Huh? You misunderstood what?
Ah, no. It's nothing.
I take it you're on the way back from shopping, Mai?
That paper bag looks pretty heavy. What'd you buy?
Uh, well, this is...
In her panic, Mai drops the paper bag in her hand, the sizable collection of doujinshi within it spilling across the floor.
Aaaah!
That's pretty clumsy of you.
It's okay! I'll pick them up myself!
Virginia picks up a few of the books, and promptly freezes in place.
T-this manga... These two girls are...
This is... er... umm...
O-oh yeah! Sitara asked me to get them for her...!
Huh? Oh, I see... How about I take them to her for you, then?
I mean, hey, I'm living over at Sitara's place and all...
Hyah!? O-oh right...!
Mai runs off in a hurry...
I don't really think this is something to hide, though...
Right, Commander?

bond_Nikotama-Mai_3.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Uh, is this about right?
No, this is how you do it.
But that looks like a meerkat dying.
Your dancing is even worse, Sitara.
Wh-what did you just say-!?
And what about you, huh, Ginny? You're from the Pentagon Shard, but you can't even breakdance!
You're no better, either. You can't even handle wasabi-pickled octopus! And you call yourself a Tokyo Shard resident?
...Um, what are you two doing?
Standby was getting boring, so we decided to try Tama-tama's dances for a...
Her dance covers have been really popular, but lately she's gotten even more famous.
Remember that prima ballerina from Moscow Shard the other day? The one who came over for a farewell performance?
She's still here in Tokyo Shard.
And as for the reason why...
She says she wants to meet Tama-tama in person.
Something about "the unique fusion of the avant-garde paper-bag-on-head style and high-level dancing skills" drawing her interest.
And the Moscow Shard celebrity even put out a video asking to meet.
Though, apparently Tama-tama, who's at the center of this whole thing, hasn't reacted in any sort of way.
Like, ignoring a world-famous prima ballerina like that? Peak streamer behavior, amirite?
So the internet's up in arms, and people aren't far from reaching for the pitchforks.
That reminds me, I heard you were also a Tama-tama fan, Mai?
Y-yeah! I am.
You'd like to see the prima ballerina and Tama-tama in the same photo too, right, Tama-chan?
I-I'm thinking there's probably a reason why Tama-tama can't come out in public...
That'd explain her paper bag...
Hmm, a reason to hide her face, huh...
Alright then, if that's how it's gonna be, let's try tracing the IP those videos were uploaded from!
S-Sitara, are you serious!?
Even if the IP only gives us a general location, we can still narrow it down from there and...
Wait, don't...
Although, if I were to name one problem to the idea...
It'd be that your friend Sitara here has neither the skills nor the knowledge to pull it off.
Oh, but we have Ginny. You know a guy or two from the Pentagon who can do that kind of stuff, yeah?
Yup! Of course I do!
A bona-fide expert, no less. And amazingly skilled.
If we ask them, we can probably get an exact location with 100% certainty.
Eeeeh!?
But in return, it won't be cheap. They're an actual pro, after all.
If I had that kind of money, I'd rather buy an FPS gaming headset instead.
Phew...
You're actually pretty curious about who Tama-tama is too, right, Commander?

commands.command: Let's just leave her alone.

items.text: G-good point...! I think we should listen to the Commander here.

commands.command: Yes, I very much am.

items.text: S-stop, please... Even you, Commander...?

bond_Nikotama-Mai_3.text: I-I'm sure the person isn't dressing like that just for show.
And I think trying to expose her would be going too far.
I mean, Zo-san hides her face with a mask, too.
So uhh, shouldn't we avoid infringing on people's privacy?
...Well, when you put it that way, you're definitely right.
But it's human nature to want to know something that's being kept secret.
Though, at this rate... I reckon someone's gonna find her eventually even if we don't.
Not really a fan of just waiting for results, but well, guess I will this time.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
The call of Moscow Shard's famous prima ballerina became a spark that sent shockwaves throughout the internet.
People from almost every online community banded together into a frantic mob, eager to uncover the face behind the paper bag.
Ultimately, imposters emerged, and the search came to a grinding halt.
Oh no... This has gotten out of control...
If they starts investigating for real,
they'll find me for sure one day...
If it gets out that Tama-tama was me...
I'll be a laughing stock for life...
Mai pulls up Tama-tama's channel content manager.
In that case... I may as well...
That night...
All of Tama-tama's dance cover videos were removed from public view.

bond_Nikotama-Mai_4.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
One month has passed since Tama-tama vanished from the face of the internet...
I-I'm so sorry... for dragging you two down...
Nonono! Don't worry about it!
...Are you not feeling well?
Your movements seemed dull, and, well, it felt like your mind was somewhere else the whole time...
We can't risk an accident happening, no matter what.
I'm saying this for your sake, but you should probably take a break from missions for...
I-I'm sorry...
Mai runs off...
Mai... Is she alright?
Commander... I get the feeling that she's hiding a problem of some kind...
Sounds like a job for our experienced Commander!
Come on, go after her!
Something... seems to be haunting Mai, so...
Perhaps you should hear her out.
Yotsuyu and Fumika bow to you, asking for your help.
Tokyo Bay · Wharf

In a corner beneath the Bay Bridge, Nikotama Mai danced...
She was all alone, sinking into the darkness...
Her dance was intense... painful... even heart-rending.
And she danced not as herself, but as Tama-tama...
Mai turns around and notices you.
C-Commander...? Why... are you here?
She takes the paper bag off of her head.
T-this paper bag...
Did you... realize it?
That Tama-tama... was me?

commands.command: Well, I had a hunch for the past little while...

items.text: Hyah! I-is that true...!?
Y-you really... do keep a close eye on everyone, Commander.

commands.command: I'll pretend I didn't see anything.

items.text: T-thank you... so much...
P-please keep this... secret... from everyone, too.

bond_Nikotama-Mai_4.text: But... I'm glad it was you... who saw me like this.
It's somehow like... a weight was lifted off my shoulders...
Since... I've been hiding this in the deepest part of my heart... without telling anybody...
That's... really not good of me, is it...
I wanted... to forget, I already threw it all away, but...
When I... danced as Tama-tama, I was so happy to have everyone watch me...
It was fulfilling... in a way I just can't describe...
Mai starts to cry...
I never realized, that...
That Tama-tama... had become so important within me...
I... What should I do now...?
I don't even... know anymore... *hic*...

commands.command: You can start again.

items.text: Start... again...?
I... I had never thought of that.

commands.command: You can cry to me.

items.text: *hic*, *sniffle*... Thank... you...
Mai cries for a little while.
I've... calmed down a bit now.
I've been lost ever since I deleted Tama-tama from the internet...

bond_Nikotama-Mai_4.text: I made the choice myself, and yet... I'm here regretting it again...
...But, it's so strange. After I... confessed it to you, I feel so much better.
It's like... all the pent-up gloom in my heart just, vanished.
I finally understand now...
That Tama-tama... was a part of me all along.
Commander... Thank you... for tonight.
I haven't decided... what to do next yet, but...
I feel like... I can start trying my hardest again tomorrow...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Later...
Yotsuyu and Fumika are watching something in the office, as...
What are you two... watching?
Yotsuyu turns to Mai to explain.
It's Zo-san dancing. She's tracing Tama-tama's moves.
Zo-san is!?
She's much more of a singer though.
So her dancing looks, well, pretty awful...
Fumika gasps in surprise, prompting Yotsuyu to turn back around and check the stream.
Whoa, she's tripped again!
Her balance is terrible, probably no thanks to that chest of hers...
But look, she's standing back up again. She's really trying her best to dance.
It's mystifying... Why is she trying so hard to...
Maybe this is her way of sending a message?
A message...?
Yeah. Tama-tama did a lot of dance covers of Zo-san's songs, right?
So maybe this is Zo-san asking her to come back to the internet...
And her way of calling out is to desperately dance like this...
Zo-san is calling me back...
She's dancing for Tama-tama's sake... For my sake...
This surprises both Yotsuyu and Fumika.
Huh? What do you mean by that?
Did you just say... "for my sake"?
I, uh... heard you pretty clear.
Don't tell me, Mai, you're...
Wh-what have I done...

bond_Nikotama-Mai_5.text: Inside Café Étoile
I'm sure it's obvious by now why we've gone through the trouble to call you two here.
Y-yes...
See, I was wondering about all the noise in the office lately, and when I looked into it...
Mai. There's a rumor going around that you're the famous Tama-tama on the internet.
And if we don't clear that up, it's gonna get in the way of our missions sooner or later.
If we asked your friends Ginny and Sitara to deal with this, they'd just try to sweep it under the rug for your sake.
So it's best for an unrelated third party to ask the important questions instead... And that's me and Kaede right here.
Miss Nikotama... What is really going on?
That paper bag Tama-tama wears in her videos comes from this store...
And from my investigations, we know you shop here quite a bit.
In addition, there are Fumika and Yotsuyu's testimonies.
They claim to have heard you refer to yourself as Tama-tama...
Well? Anything to say for yourself?
I-I'm sorry for causing the commotion...
Tama-tama is... m-me...!
So you admit to it, then.

Hold on a second, Kaede.
...This is going way too well.
When things are going really smoothly, it's actually even more suspicious. It's an ironclad rule of mysteries.
I didn't read so many of Nishimura Kyoutarou and Akagawa Jirou's books just for show.
Impossible... You're saying that Mai admitted to this on purpose to obscure the truth?
That possibility is very much there. Let's look at the facts again.
The precise words that Fumika and Yotsuyu claim to have heard were these:
"[Zo-san]'s dancing for Tama-tama's sake... For my sake..."
And when they heard this being said, I believe they happened to have their backs turned...
In that case, it may be possible that they misheard someone else say it...
We can't forget about all the details... At the time, Mai wasn't the only person in the scene.
There was one other person present... and that person... was you, Commander!
B-but that's impossible!
Eeeeh? C-Commander...!?

commands.command: You've found me out... So much for trying to hide it...

items.text: Eeeeh!? It can't be!
B-but Tama-tama should have been female...
*gasp*!
D-did the Commander wear a paper bag... precisely because he was crossdressing!?
Looks like the truth has finally come to light.

commands.command: I'm going on a trip. Farewell.

items.text: Running's not gonna serve you any good, Commander.
So Tama-tama really was you.
B-but isn't that much too fanciful to be true?
In the first place, Tama-tama is female, no?
Looks can deceive, young Kaede. You've still got some growing up to do.
At my club, I see men faking their gender all the time!
T-that... is a realm I can scarcely imagine.

bond_Nikotama-Mai_5.text: To think that he hid his face under a paper bag and stuffed his chest to make big titties...
And then uploaded his crazy, depraved dancing on the internet for all to see...
Our Commander has been a shameless man since the very day he joined Narukozaka!
That does remind me...
Back when Sitara and Virginia suggested to expose Tama-tama's identity...
Mai replied to them that doing so would be infringing on the dancer's privacy...
And in saying so, she defended Tama-tama, or so I have heard...
You'd even defend a lewd commander like him...
You really are kind, Mai.
Eh, er...
I believe in you. I'm sure you've done nothing wrong.
My sincere apologies for doubting you, Miss Nikotama...
Umm... Well...
Don't worry, Commander. I won't tell the Director about this.
But in return, I'd sure like a new handbag one of these days~ Ah, I'm just talking to myself here.
For the time being, we will tell everyone that the two of you are innocent.
A pointless uproar in the office serves no one, after all...
And now that that's taken care of, I'm gonna go check out some purses on my way home~
Yumi and Kaede leave.
C-Commander... Thank you so much.
F-for covering for me.

commands.command: It was the right thing to do.

items.text: I-I'm sure... it's not that simple, I'm... really happy for what you did.
S-someday... when I get the courage... I'll...
I'll tell the truth to everyone.
...Th-that Tama-tama is me...

commands.command: Good thing those two were dense as rocks.

items.text: B-but... I put you through so much embarrassment, Commander...
I-I'm really sorry.
Someday... I'll tell everyone the truth,
and I'll... m-mend your reputation!

bond_Nikotama-Mai_5.text: Th-thank you... once again... I really mean it.
I'd be happy if you could... uh... keep looking after me from now on too.
That night, Tama-tama finally returned to the internet, uploading dozens of videos all at once.
The Moscow Shard prima ballerina posted a comment as well, welcoming her return.
Thanks to that, one of Tama-tama's dance videos set a new twenty-four hour view count record on the platform.

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_1-1.text: And now for our next story.
Early this afternoon, Shahanshah Al-Abdullah of House Betrorum, ruler of the Alf-Laylan capital Pārsa,
has arrived in Japan as a diplomatic representative for his Shard.
The royal family's private jet, carrying the king and his entorage, touched down at Narita International Airport just earlier.
As he was stepping down from the aircraft,
Shahdokht Fatima Betrorum, sole daughter of the king and heir apparent of the royal family, could be seen walking alongside him.
The crown princess had been suffering from an unknown life-threatening disease in the past,
but appears to have recovered prior to this visit and is currently in perfect health.
During his five-day visit to Tokyo Shard,
the king plans to meet with high-level officials of AEGiS Tokyo and representatives of domestic Gear manufacturers to discuss various topics,
including the prominent issue of Phlogiston fuel export prices, the state of Middle-eastern affairs,
continued stationing of peacekeeping forces within the Shard, and economic and technological assistance.
Furthermore, Shahdokht Fatima, who is known for her passionate love for Japan,
will be staying as a long-term foreign exchange student–
–and even plans to actively participate in Actress activities as a part of her royal duties.
The royal family's press secretary issues the following statement:
"We do hope you will look forward to the future exploits of our beloved Shahdokht Fatima during her stay in Tokyo Shard!"
Moving on, next up on the program, we have–
West Shinjuku · Narukozaka Manufacturing
Greetings, Commander.
I, Fatima Betrorum, shall be in your care from today onwards.

commands.command: I see you're doing much better nowadays.

items.text: I am very grateful for the assistance–
–that Mai, Sitara, and Virginia provided me before.
If not for the members of your company, I very much doubt I would be standing here today.
And in addition, as a member of a royal house,
I have decided to dedicate my life to understanding the mysterious phenomenon that saved me from my sickness.
I believe that if I can unravel its mystery with the help of everyone here,
I may be able to save some of those who are currently suffering from disease all around the world,
even if I am unable to save everyone.
Hence, my studying abroad on this occasion is not simply for the sake of broadening my horizons,
but for research purposes as well.

commands.command: What's a princess like you doing at our company?

items.text: I would like you to listen calmly to what I am about to say.
There is but one reason for my visit today.
And that is, of course...
Because I would like to be together with my Tri-Stella☆ friends.
Oh? Perhaps... that was not convincing enough?
Hmm. I expected no less from someone of your repute, Commander.
I can see that lies will find no purchase on you.
Hehe. This reason I just mentioned is only a personal pretext.
Or, the royal family's official stance, so to speak.
Ordinarily, considering my position,
it would perhaps be more fitting for AEGiS Tokyo to manage my stay.
However, as you may know,
our Alf-Layla Shard, the largest and oldest Shard in existence,
prides itself on having the largest Phlogiston fuel reserves of any Shard,
the export of which constitutes almost ninety percent of our government revenue.
The economic benefits of Phlogiston are great and blinding,
and we are obligated to distribute it equally to our people.
However, this great brilliance casts an equally great shadow...
And that is precisely why–
–I must maintain a certain distance from political and bureaucratic forces, including AEGiS.
In addition, from an overall perspective,
Alf-Layla remains a land of anarchy and chaos far from achieving peaceful governance...
It is unfortunate, but...
House Betrorum, which represents our Shard internationally, is also beset by opposing factions.
The court is a place of many schemes and is in no way monolithic.
While we embroil ourselves in virtueless intrigue,
our people continue to suffer in ways we can only imagine...
Continued hardship births animosity, which will inevitably sink its blade deep...
I dearly hope you will come to realize–
–why we, the royal family,
chose your Narukozaka Manufacturing on this occasion.

commands.command: Even if we're separated by social standing...

items.text: "Oh my!"
"But... it is impossible..."
"I cannot escape the grasp of my father."
"Eh...? The wide world... is waiting for us...?"
"Yes... you have my trust... Until I draw my very last breath..."
I'm quite surprised that you know of this, Commander!
The elopement bromance between the prince raised as a princess–
–and his brother, the captain of the royal guard!
Hehe, I see that you are a person of refined tastes.

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_1-1.text: Thank you for the conversation, Commander. I now have the confidence to be a member here.
I shall be henceforth at your service.
Not as a princess, but as an Actress under your command.

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_2-1.text: One night, at Fatima's accomodation in Tokyo, she tries on Touin High's uniform.
Heehee, what do you think?
It suits you very well.
With this, I can proudly stand beside my Tri-Stella☆ friends,
and declare myself a student of Touin Academy's General High School.
Speaking of which, Your Highness, is there a particular reason why you opted for Touin Academy?
I have heard that it is a school created by and for the common folk.
Would St. Amalthea not have been a more appropriate choice, considering its traditionality and prestige?
According to Muhammad's report, St. Amalthea is too closely associated with the Hojo group, among other things.
It would be imprudent of me to create issues for my father while studying abroad.
What forethought... Please forgive me for my thoughtless remark.
I do not mind. And besides...
Heehee.
I do wonder how surprised everyone would be–
–if I suddenly appeared at their school.
Touin Academy General High School, Classroom 2-B
The next day...
Eh...? A... transfer student? Coming to our class?
Yeah, it was the hot topic of the morning.
I-I wonder what kind of person they are...
Well, I think they said something about them being a baseball boy?
Non, non, Ginny. Wrong, I say.
My own sources tell me that it's gonna be a beautiful, exotic lady.
The heck? But I heard they were a simple-looking guy.
Eeeeh? Naaah, it's gonna be a rich girl, that's what the rumors say.
Aaah... it's one of those classic transfer student things, where all the conflicting details make the expectations go way up...
Just a guess, but if we piece together all the different things we know,
then wouldn't our transfer student be... a boyish girl who's good at softball?
Eh?
Huh?
A long-lost childhood friend, who looked just like a boy when she was young.
And a guy, who she's always had faint feelings for...
"Eh? Wait... We've... met before? Eh? So... you were a girl..."
"Ahaha... Actually, since back then, I've... liked you, kind of... Just kidding..."
"I noticed."
"Eh?"
"You 'liked' me? ...What about now? Do you... like me still?"
Because of the priceless memories that neither of them could forget...
Days too early to be a love story, but too precious to be cast aside...
There'd be a reunion with that kind of feel, maybe?
I mean, do you guys not have any childhood friends like–
Nope.
Nope.
...Oh, well.
But, I mean, a transfer student is definitely something to get excited about.
Mhm. I get that.
The morning bells ring, and everyone takes their seats.
All right, time for your greetings.
Stand up.
Bow.
Sit down.
Right, we're getting a new transfer student today.
The moment of truth...
What kind of girl is she~ Ahhh I'm so nervous~
Hello, fun days ahead...
The transfer student enters the classroom.
I'm Sasaoka Shinji from Hamada in Shimame Shard.
My best pitch is the slider. Nice to meet you all.
Meanwhile at Fatima's hotel, as Sitara, Ginny and Mai are having their minds blown...
By the way, when will I be transferring in?
In two days, Your Highness.
Ah, so close, yet so far away.

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_3-1.text: Another day at the office...
Hey, Fatima, haven't you been taking an awful lot of shifts these days?
Is that so?
Mhm... You already have your official duties on top of going to school, I don't want to see you working too hard...
Agreed. Are you taking proper rests?
I am deeply grateful for your concern.
However, I truly am not overworking myself.
In fact, I actually find coming here to be quite enjoyable.
Everyone in the company treats me not as royalty, but as another human being.
And by being here, I am able to witness wonderful situations that make my heart dance in excitement,
the likes of which are simply unimaginable inside the palace.
I suppose that is why these days off are actually quite exhilarating...
...So much so, that they make me "run out of juice", so to speak.
Mai and Ginny think...
U-umm... Fatima?
How do you spend your weekends?
My weekends? Let me think...
I wake up at six o'clock every morning and pray, and then...
Hmm... Let me use last Sunday as an example. As I had breakfast-
Fatima recalls her last Sunday...
Le Palais Tokyo Hotel, Suite
7:00 AM: Breakfast
What is my schedule for today, Narges?
Yes, Your Highness.
We will depart from the hotel at 8:15 AM and arrive at the Alf-Laylan embassy at 8:35.
There, we will meet with the wife of the Alf-Laylan ambassador to Japan. And then, after reconfirming the afternoon schedule-
Ah, what of the Sunday TV programs that I asked to be recorded?
Rest assured, Muhammad will handle it without fail.
I see, thank you. Please continue.
We will then depart the embassy at 9:00 AM for Nerima, arriving there at 9:50 AM.
Then, after an explanation from the executive comittee on-site–
We will be inspecting the Alf-Laylan Festival,
the product of the hard work of our Alf-Laylan compatriots in Japan, yes?
The festival does remind me.
How goes my suggestion to the home government to redesign our mascot characters?
Our citizens will worry if we do not at least win one higher-ranking award at next year's grand prix.
Rest assured, Muhammad is handling that as well.
I see, thank you again. Do continue.
Next, we will depart for Nakano at 11:00 AM, arriving at the Alf-Laylan embassy there at 11:40.
And from 11:55 AM, there will be a luncheon and socializing event with the Alf-Laylan Ladies' Society.
Afterwards, from 2:00 PM, you will be experiencing Japanese flower arrangement and tea ceremony with the Society's members.
This is important in furthering your knowledge of Japanese cultures, yes, but also–
I am aware.
The ladies I will be meeting are married to some of the most powerful financiers in the Alf-Laylan economic sphere.
I will seek to establish valuable connections with them.
Without showing offense, but also without forgetting the dignity of the royal family.
Thank you. Following that, from 4:00 PM–
After that, I met with the former Kassel Shard Ambassador to Japan and their spouse,
and at night, I attended a friendly soccer match–
–between representative teams of Alf-Layla Shard and Tokyo Shard.
Hmm... I don't know.
That doesn't sound like a proper weekend anymore.
Yeah... It really is hard being a princess.
I think you should reduce your number of shifts just a little more...
Ginny agrees. Not long afterwards, an angry Sitara storms into the office.
Grr~! Screw that glasses devil and her heart of stone!
Did something happen?
Yeah, hear me out here. This Saturday, see.
That's when my copy of Cool or Dandy Muscular Wife 2 comes in.
Ah, I believe... that was the sequel to an FPS game you enjoyed, Sitara?
Yup, exactly. So I asked for a day off next Sunday.
And I even told her I'd be willing to come in on Monday! But guess what she said!
"Haah? What are you even saying?"
"Nobody would take a day off for such a personal reason."
...But aren't all days off for personal reasons?
That's what a vacation day is, right? A personal thing?
*sigh*~ I'm so done at this point.
Maybe I'll just say I'm not feeling well and head home early...
That must not have been enjoyable for you.
Right...? Right!? You think so, yeah?
Oh, that reminds me!
Hey, Fatima, you got any plans next Sunday? We could–
Noooo!
Noooo!
Sitara doesn't understand...

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_3-2.text: After a round of explanations for Sitara...
For real!?
If you can't even do day off stuff on a day off,
then that defeats the whole purpose of a day off!
This is a grave situation we can not overlook.
Is it, now?
See, taking apart the kanji for "busy" (忙) gives you "heart" (心) and "die" (亡).
You're gonna turn into another Fumika at this rate.
But, I do think you should spend at least a bit of time on yourself...
I'm not exaggerating, working too much really isn't good for your health...
Yeah. Heck, I even rest while I'm working.
Labor and vacation at the same time!
Is such a thing possible?
No.
Sitara averts her gaze.
I do indeed have a desire to experience what a free day off is like,
However, my maidservants, and especially Muhammad...
Is he a strict kind of guy?
Yes, quite... Though he is also equally strict on himself...
He frequently admonishes me with words such as-
"Please consider your position before making such displays of selfishness."
And "You lack proper awareness of your status as royalty."
His stubborn inflexibility goes to such an extent that it could be considered his one distinguishing trait...
According to him, he is always on guard "to respond to any possible situation that may arise, however unlikely."
And thus, he works every day, knowing not of relaxation.
Bleh~ Is he doing alright?
Maybe it's actually Mister Muhammad who's worked so much that he can't think of anything else but...
Perhaps...
Thinking back, I can remember many cases where that conjecture might apply.
Even my father, who has worked with him for long,
claims to have never seen him rest throughout the years.
This extends to his subordinates as well. Among them, there is a saying that goes:
"Our superior never rests, so we'll never get to rest."
Ay-yi-yi~ Scary-scary-scaaary~
It's black, black, Black Muhammad RX~
I kind of... feel really bad for you now.
If it's come to this, then the only thing we can do-
-is to get his superior Fatima to take a break.
Unfortunately, my schedule for the rest of this month is already filled, thanks to Muhammad's scheming.
That's no way to put it.
Then, what about next month?
Let me think... I do remember that I am unoccupied on the first Sunday of next month, for now.
Mmm, that reminds me of something at Akiba on that week, I think it was...
Oh... That's when the GS collab cafe is having their limited menu.
Lucky us! I guess we'll be going with that!
Everyone happily agrees.
In that case, we'd better get those days off arranged.
Mhm... Let's go talk to Fumika right now.
Ginny nods.
Thanks for the help~!
Are you fine with staying here, Sitara?
If I go, Fumika's just gonna say no and send me away...
I'd be better off asking for it on SenChat without even showing my face!
I see...
Fatima thinks to herself briefly.
I shall do the same, then.
The two write their messages.
"I would be most grateful..."
"...if I were allowed a day off on the first Sunday of next month."
Aaah... O Goddess of Fortune,
Grant me mercy... Grant me mercy...
Screw it, here goes nothing!
Sitara slams the "send" button on Fatima's SenChat app, and the message is delivered.
And there...
...is the reply...
They check the message.
Eeeeh!?
Eeeeh!?
Mai and Ginny return from their talk with Fumika.
A-are you two okay?
What happened!?
The break plans are a go!
And not one word of complaint about it!

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_3-3.text: Granmatica Story Collab Café
We're heeere! Being at this café always pumps me up~
The GS collab café. Business sure is booming today.
Mhm... They change up the menu on a schedule, and most importantly, everything's actually good.
Hope you didn't mind me suddenly asking you to come along, Commander.
I do apologize that we are occupying your time for my sake.
My retainers insisted that I be accompanied by a local adult.
Well, I bet if he knew stuff about the game, he'd have just as much fun as us~

commands.command: I think I'll enjoy this even without the game knowledge.

items.text: That is quite understandable.
The café's Medieval-inspired atmosphere is quite charming by itself.
In fact, it's a great opportunity to get you into GS.
Umm... There is a free demo you can try...
I am still in the process of catching up to everyone as well.
Doing so alongside you, Commander, would be quite the enjoyable experience.

commands.command: I actually treat the GS world like the real one...

items.text: Really!?
F'real!?
Ginny is not as amused.
Wait, what server? How far have you gotten?
U-umm, i-if you're looking for a new guild, we're recruiting...!
Guys... Wouldn't the Commander know exactly when we game if we invited him in?
We certainly do continue into the night every so often,
despite any plans in the following day.
N-nah, we don't do that, right?
I uh, don't think we do?
Ginny gives another unamused stare, to Sitara this time.

commands.command: Teach me step by step, Fatima.

items.text: Oh my, you would like me to guide you?
No, no, no, no!
Fatima curbs her excitement and looks to Ginny for an explanation.
Take a good look at his eyes, Fatima.
Fatima turns to you.
Commander? You trying to start an international incident or what?
If the wrong people catch wind of this, we might not have a Tokyo Shard to be in by tomorrow!
Certainly... I suppose Sitara or Mai would be better suited to this task than I am.
Ginny stares at Fatima, unamused by her words.

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_3-3.text: Our prize draw will be starting shortly!
Mm, it's time.
Bring out those tickets we got at the reception~
Everyone takes out their tickets.
Now, our first prize of the day goes to...
Number 14!
Sitara, upon seeing that her ticket was not the winning one, gives a somewhat exaggerated reaction, to Mai and Fatima's amusement.
Mm, oh well. I'm number 10.
Pity. My number was 13.
Wait, if our numbers are all together...
Ah! Commander! Number 14 is you!
Not long after, the waitress presents the group with a large, fruit-decorated cake themed after a Persian palace.
Thank you for waiting, and congratulations again on winning the prize.
Here's your Dune Palace Cake. Enjoy~
Oh boy... That's one big cake right there.
Yeah! It's been likened to a final boss, and I heard it takes eight people to even come close to finishing it!
Well, the Commander won it for us, so he gets first dibs.
How about you feed it to him, Fatima?
Do the "aaah" thing!
Er, is that... not... unseemingly?
Nah. In a party like this, it'd be a friendship thing.
I see... If that is the case...
Please do excuse me, Commander.
Say "aaah"-
Fatima feeds you a bite of the cake.

After the meal, the group moves onto other fun activities, such as visiting a hobby store and playing at an arcade. In the evening, the group disbands, but Fatima lingers in the downtown streets for a little longer, reveling in the atmosphere. She waves to you, then comes up to chat.
Now I see what a real vacation is like.
