I tasted freedom, away from the burden of the entourage that surrounds me.
Aahhh...
It was truly an enjoyable time.
Heehee. How beautiful the sunset is.
...But, sadly, my duty as a princess calls, and I must return.
I am most grateful–
–for your choice to accompany me on this whim,
and for the wonderful day of rest that you, and everyone, have blessed me with.
I am certain that, to me,
the priceless memories of this day will remain unforgettable for as long as I live.

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_4-1.text: One day at the office, Fatima is trying on her newly-arrived personal Combat Suit, the Ārmaiti.
Oooh! So this is your personal Suit, Fatima.
Yes. It arrived from my home country not long ago.
Now that you mention it, I have been hearing a lot of grumbling over at Engineering. Sounded like Mr. Iwata, Rita and the others were having a good time.
The Suit itself was manufactured in Île-de-France to local specifications.
It thus did not conform to Tokyo's regulatory limits, and I requested that they resolve this issue.
What do you think? Does it suit me?
Yeah, you look really cool!
Right, Tama-chan?
Mhm. It's wonderful...
Thank you very much.
From your compliments, I am now certain that–
–there will be no issues with revealing this Suit at our upcoming ceremony.
What ceremony?
A memorial service in Alf-Layla, to honor those lost in war.
We plan to host a simultaneous debut event for this Suit during the occasion–
–as a symbol of peace.
A memorial service...
Yes. As you all may know,
the Shard now known as Alf-Layla is a complex amalgamation of many smaller Shards.
A "Composite Shard", if you will.
Its long history is one of chaos,
with regional instabilities dating back as far as the Earth Age, and still continuing to this very day.
On one hand, the people of Alf-Layla war amongst each other, for reasons rooted in ethnic history or religious beliefs.
On the other, foreign powers clash in our lands over the harvesting rights of Phlogiston fuel, with our people being none the wiser.
And it does not end there.
While we struggle to repel the Vice amidst these extreme conditions,
a cult of Vice worshippers, calling themselves "SIN",
was born on Alf-Laylan soil one day.
Some even say that the very source of our conflicts, which stems from the Earth Age, has been lost to time.
That there no longer exists any living human being–
–who remembers how everything truly began.
Regardless, the conflicts themselves continue and repeat without rest,
fueled by a never-ending cycle of resentment and suffering.
That is the history of our Alf-Layla Shard.
Mmm...
I thought I already knew how bad things were over there, but...
Now that we heard someone actually from the region talk about it...
I do apologize. It seems I have darkened the mood.
No, it's not your...
...I wonder why.
I mean, even we can tell how they've got piles of hard problems to deal with.
So why... can't they all just get along?
All we're doing here... is spending our days aimlessly...
So we're not really qualified to say anything, but...
There has to be, like, something they can do...
Well, it's easier said than done...
Sitara goes into thought.
Thank you.
For your concern towards our people.
I am saved by your thoughts and feelings alone.
Mgh... You okay, Ginny?
Are you not feeling well?
Oh, nah, my bad.
I was thinking about some stuff.
Hey, Fatima.
That Suit debut you're doing at the ceremony... You should cancel it.
G-Ginny...?
What's up all of a sudden?
Well, er, there's no deeper meaning behind that.
Would you allow me to listen to whatever worries you may have?
Hmm... How should I put this.
I don't really have the right words to, uh, explain myself either...
...It just feels wrong, I guess?
"Wrong", you say?
Yeah, wrong.
However I think about this, it just all sounds so hollow. Like, egotistical high society rhetoric.
At the end of the day, the ceremony is just another sideshow.
...Who is it really that'd be happy about it happening?
And... how is everyone else supposed to feel?

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_4-2.text: Fatima ruminates on Ginny's words.
Er, uh... Ginny? I-is something wrong...?
Ginny...
W-well, I mean, everyone's got their own angle to the problem, so...
Ah, er... Sorry.
It just... felt a little off to me, is all.
Don't worry about it.
Regarding the message you intended to convey... I do believe that I understand to some extent.
However, at this present moment,
our House Betrorum cannot afford to cease forging onward.
I learned this lesson during a conflict in the past.
Fatima recalls that time...
Three years ago--
At the time, Fatima and company were leading a group of refugees through the desert...
Hurry, while the cover of night remains...
How long must we continue to...
No... more... I can't walk anymore...
Do your best. We are almost there.
The Europe-lead peacekeeping force is waiting for us just beyond here.
But deep inside, she is not as optimistic.
Everyone is exhausted...
Are there truly peacekeepers waiting for us ahead...?
No... I must not give up...
Your Highness, the sun is starting to rise.
I know.
At this rate... Please go on ahead. If any of us are to survive, it must be you.
You have asked this of me so many times now...
But as I have said, I cannot do such a thing.
But...
Now, let us stand and move forward together. We are not far now.
How much longer until the fire claims me...?
How many more empty lies must I tell...? How much longer must I deceive my people...?
As Fatima despairs, the sound of gunfire rings out nearby.
Aaaaah! I-it's the enemy!
Aaaaaaaah!
Run, everybody!
The group runs for their lives as they continue to be fired upon.
Please, have mercy upon us...
Suddenly, Narges is grazed by a bullet.
Aagh!
Narges! Are you okay!?
This wound... is only minor. I will be fine.
Please run, Your Highness. Do not worry about me.
But how could I...
Hurry! You must leave me! Go!
But the gunfire catches up first, cutting off her route of escape...
This is... the end...
But as Fatima prepares to accept her fate...
*bang*
*bang*
A young half-Japanese girl with flowing silver hair engages the enemy forces with a semi-automatic weapon, saving the two from certain death.
Get away from here, now!
O-okay!
Fatima supports the injured Narges and the two escape under the cover of their mysterious savior, not daring to look behind them...
Fatima: Later, in a neighborhood that had regained an ever-so-slight semblance of normality, I looked for the warrior from that day...
Aah, Your Highness. You are alive.
Yes. I am well, as you can see.
Thank goodness all of you are as well.
I wasn't sure what would happen when we were scattered that night.
Yes, if that warrior wasn't there back then...
Fatima nods.
That reminds me, was that warrior a soldier of our country?
Fatima: Indeed... If she did not come to our rescue, then we would not be standing here right now, but rather...
Fatima: I wished to at least offer her a word of gratitude.
Umm... Your Highness...
Yes?
How long... will these days go on?
Hey! Stop it!
But, we can't bear it any longer...
Please tell me, Your Highness. How much longer must we endure until peace comes?
Well...
As Fatima contemplates how to answer, she hears a voice from nearby.
Answer her.
To her astonishment, it is the mysterious soldier who saved her life.
Take her hand and answer her, even if you must lie.
She looks around for the origin of the voice, but finds nothing in the busyness of the bazaar.
Right now, these people have nothing else to cling onto.
Perhaps the words you choose are not true at the moment, but you need only act and make them true afterwards.
That is noblesse oblige, the duty bestowed upon you.
Fatima steels her resolve.
Your Highness...
...Soon. Even now, the light of hope continues to spread across the land.
We can overcome these difficult times together.
O-okay... Your Highness...
Back in the present, Fatima speaks to Ginny.
I am deeply aware that, in Alf-Layla's continued state of danger and conflict,
hosting a memorial service for the lost is a matter of controversy,
and that reactions to the event are mixed both within and without the country.
However, it is undeniably true–
–that the ceremony will grant solace and hope to many as well.
Though my words may ring hollow now,
I am prepared to repeat them as many times as necessary, until the day comes when they become true.
Then... show me.
Show me a ceremony...
...that the dead of Alf-Layla can accept–
That the grief-stricken people of Alf-Layla can accept.

chara_Fatima-Betrorum_4-3.text: Pārsa International Airport, Alf-Layla Shard
A ceremony acceptable not only to those lost in war, but also the grief-stricken people...
Is something the matter, Your Highness?
Fatima, surprised by the question, is lifted out of her thoughts.
No, it is nothing.
Look around. The people are overjoyed that you have returned after so long.
Ah, Your Highness!
Fatima greets the man...
I'm so glad you're full of energy.
...and the woman as well.
Now, Your Highness, the car is waiting for you.
Fatima contemplates briefly...
I would like to inspect the city before returning to the palace.
And tell Muhammad to come as fast as possible, if you would.
Certainly.
Narges leaves to find Muhammad.
I must burn Alf-Layla's current state into my mind...
After seeing the state of the city, Fatima and her entourage arrive at the border of House Betrorum–controlled territory.
I see this is the farthest point for which we can guarantee safety.
Yes.
This is not far at all from our capital Pārsa.
Such a meager area...
My apologies. We are cooperating closely with peacekeeping forces,
but the tribes who oppose us have banded together and appear to be regaining power.
Why must fellow Alf-Laylans be in conflict with each other?
The chaos stemmed from foreign intervention over Phlogiston rights in the first place...
But here we are, forced to accept the aid of peacekeepers from those same foreign powers.
Reality never goes the way one would like it to, I suppose.
I do not know how to answer that.
But even so,
we must continue to raise the torch of hope.
In this, your talents yet remain indispensible.
Please, lend them to us.
I am undeserving of those words. I, Muhammad, will stand with House Betrorum as ever.
Thank you.
And regarding the ceremony tomorrow...
Shahrazad Palace, Alf-Layla
That night, Fatima looks at the night scenery from a terrace, when...
So this is where you were, Fatima.
Yes, I was gazing at the bright, distant stars.
I see... Earlier, for the first time in a while, Muhammad shared a complaint with me.
I do apologize for those willful demands I have made.
It is fine, you must have considerations of your own.
How you have grown...
It seems I was right in letting you go to Tokyo Shard.
Even though you were in such opposition to the idea at first?
You have not changed one bit, Father.
Hahaha. Have I, now?
Fatima smiles.
Father, about tomorrow...
No need... Follow your own beliefs. Walk your own path.
But never forget that resolve you have made, to walk alongside the weak.
Fatima solemnly nods.
Now, you have an early day ahead of you. Rest well.
I will. Good night... Father.
Fatima leaves to rest for tomorrow. Her father Al-Abdullah, now alone at the terrace, looks to the midnight sky and prays.
Please, watch over her, through the difficult path she intends to tread.
On the day of the Alf-Layla Shard Memorial Service for War Dead--
We hereby offer our solemn tribute to the many souls lost in this land.
As I am certain you are aware, my fellow Alf-Laylans,
despite the countless and priceless sacrifices that have been made,
Alf-Layla Shard is still confronted by countless difficulties, of which there is no end in sight.
The damage caused by this struggle is untold, and it continues to mount even now.
Meanwhile, Ginny watches Fatima's televised speech from Narukozaka's lounge.
In addition, I would like to take this opportunity to acknowledge that Alf-Layla Shard, as it is today,
is built ontop of the many noble spirits–
–who, exceeding national and racial borders, strove to save this land. This we must never forget.
How many regrets must they have left this world with,
away from their home and underneath foreign skies...
How many family members grieved for them, knowing they will never return...
When I think of these thoughts, I cannot help but hang my head low.
They are a stark reminder of my own powerlessness.
A certain student council president of a certain school watches the broadcast as well.
Without all of the sacrifices made up to this point,
our Alf-Layla Shard cannot exist.
If such is the case, then I would like to place my faith in a possibility.
That the Alf-Laylan people can take the hands of one another and become one,
and in doing so, overcome the countless adversities that we face.
So that the cycle of negativity upon this land may be broken. So that we may achieve peace and walk toward the future.
I will not waver in this faith,
no matter how many ridicule the idea as an infantile fantasy,
no matter how many criticize my words as hollow.
To make this a reality, I have decided–
–that I will walk alongside all of the Alf-Laylan citizens who call this Shard home.
I will continue to pray, continue to believe, to pledge, to prepare.
That a small seed of happiness today may grow a little by tomorrow, and cover more of our lands.
And let this seed be under loving care. Let it be a gathering place of joy.
Never dying, nor lost, nor forgotten.
Let it sprout and grow, one tiny step at a time.
Alongside all of us—
The speech concludes to thunderous applause.

chara_Niiya-Serina_1-1.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Ah, Commander, so this is where you were.
My name is Niiya Serina. I have recently been dispatched to your company-
-as a full-time office worker by AEGiS' recommendation. Pleased to meet you.
I would also like to be of service to your company as an Actress.
Therefore, I would appreciate being allowed to sortie when missions arise.
This Combat Suit, you ask?
Yes... I brought my own, since I am here as a temp.
This is a pretty typical Suit, but Narukozaka doesn't seem to use it much.
I believe your primary Suits are the predominant model from twelve years ago,
while the ex-Murakumo Actresses appear to have a designer model of their own.
I understand that it's easier to use a familiar Suit, but...
Maintenance-wise and practicality-wise, I think it would be better to have model uniformity.
It will reduce running costs further the more your company grows.
Please consider it, if you don't mind.
I'm sorry, I just... That was forward of me.

commands.command: It's a good idea. I'll look into it.

items.text: It'll require an initial investment, but that should be recouped in a few years.
Ah, I'm, er, not a Combat Suit saleswoman or anything.

commands.command: No, it's important that we keep our individual Actresses unique.

items.text: Yes. I do understand where you're coming from.
I see you're the kind to prioritize your Actresses rather than company expenses, Commander.

commands.command: Nah, don't wanna piss off our Head Engineer.

items.text: Your capability as a commander is famous, but you're no good at office politics?
If you'd like me to, Commander, I can help you out...
Eh!? You don't want the Head Engineer to yell at you?
Seriously? Is that really the reason?
Nothing to be done then, I suppose.

chara_Niiya-Serina_1-1.text: I'm sorry for meddling in something so minor.
I can't help but worry about these things.
My family used to manage a small factory in my home town back in the day...
And ever since I became an adult and started working, I've watched companies go under, gotten laid off...
I can't overlook these things... no matter how small.
Pretending not to see evil deeds is the same as being complicit in them.
And I will never allow evil to run its course.
O-Of course, by evil... I mean wasteful company expenditures.
Please leave the general management of the company to me.
Be it as an accountant or an Actress, I'll give it my all.
I look forward to working together with you.

chara_Niiya-Serina_2-1.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
I've finished confirming our bank account activity and writing invoices.
That was fast.
Now then, our tax stamps and postage stamps are running out...
I bought more while taking care of the bank transfer.
I've finished recording the petty spendings in our cash book as well.
You're on top of things. I can see why Miss Youko recommended you.
I haven't worked at ten or so companies after graduating high school for nothing.
That many!?
The first company I went to was a small-time place. The president was a dictator, and his accounting was a mess, so it went bankrupt.
The next one was a slightly bigger but cozy company, but...
I'm guessing they were pretty similar to how we're like?
Their parent company in the business group gave us one tight quota after another. Accounting fraud was a constant.
...Oh dear.
A whistleblower exposed it all, and the company's atmosphere took a turn for the worse... Finally, along came the restructuring bonanza.
It was nothing but unemployment and then changing jobs, so I figured I'd be better off just being a temp at that point.
With everything I've been through, I have plenty of experience in taking care of the usual office business.
I'm still learning how to do AEGiS paperwork, though.
Kaede and I will help you with those.
Just as Miss Youko said, if someone as experienced as you is here with us, I think we'll be able to manage.
Thanks for the help, and I look forward to a productive future together.
Fumika bows.
No, no, I should be saying the same to you.
Serina bows.
Haha.
Haha.
Exchanging bows like that is so stiff of us.
That's on you, Fumika.
You do everything so dependably even though you're still in high school, like an upstanding little worker bee.
Since we sent Yumi to Nakano, I've been stuck doing this sort of work...
Before I knew it, I'd become like the resident office worker.
And you know what Sitara is like...
Actually, Sitara's completely normal.
Sitara's normal!?
You're at that age where you don't have as much to worry about yet, so instead of working too hard...
What's the matter?
Hearing that Sitara is normal just made me reel a little...
If that was normal, Narukozaka would go bankrupt.
No, the Tokyo Shard would surely be destroyed.
Suddenly, Sitara appears before the two.
Is my name a death curse to you-!?
Sitara!
Gwaah–
My eyes– My eyes–!
This... Is it normal?
In my opinion, it's best to play and have fun while you still can.
Heh–heh–heh. Unlike you, Fumika, Serina understands what's right!
I approve!
The dictator Fumikah has been overthrown by Princess Serina, and Narukozaka is now free!
Three cheers for Narukozaka! Three cheers for Princess Serina!
Anyway, I'm just gonna go play games in the lounge while standing by.
"It's best to play and have fun while you still can!"
Sitara runs off...
Ah, Sitara! Stop right there! How about you help Serina out a little with her–
It's all right. In terms of main occupation, I'm more of an office clerk than an Actress.
High school girls have a right to be mischevious, don't you think?
Please don't spoil Sitara too much.
Fumika, you should do less office work, too. Maybe use that time to focus on being an Actress,
or do things you can only do when you're a student.
Even if you say that...
I'm used to taking care of office business for small companies.
I can take care of any odd jobs this company has to throw at me.
You're right, lately... Maybe I've been putting off my own things for too long...
Your you time is precious. All the more so when you're young.
Once you become an adult, it gets a lot harder to do the things you love.
Maybe I should reflect a little on myself and my future.
I would like to clear my backlog of books...
...Is it okay for me to ask so much of you?
I might not do the work as flawlessly as Miss Andou the full-time AEGiS clerk,
but of course you can turn to me.
That's why I was sent here, after all.
Ah, but...
Work requests for changing the hallway light fixtures and fixing the restroom door, right? I'll handle that.
I'm really sorry for pushing so much on you...
No worries, this is my job.
Fumika, please go get some rest before your next sortie.
Read those books you've been meaning to.
All right. Thank you so much!
Now then... Time to get to work~
...Fufufuu♪

chara_Niiya-Serina_3-1.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
The "Narukozaka Actresses' Ladies' Party"... ...was it?
Yep! You're coming too, right, Serina?
Thank you so much for the invitation.
But I'm only here as a temp. Is it really all right for me to come?
I'm still inexperienced as an Actress, too...
It's fine, it's fine! That kind of thing doesn't matter.
I mean, we can finally go on a girls' night out here at Narukozaka.
I've been wanting to do this for a while now.
But, Actresses are all girls, right?
Why haven't you been able to do it until now?
See, it's not very exciting to have a girls' night out with a bunch of underage twerps.
Sitara, Fumika, and the rest... No, thank you~
And no other high-schoolers or middle-schoolers either...
I want to throw a girls' night out bash with only adult women.
Koyui and the two of us, after five. Get hype!
We'll unfold all the sparkly grown-up girls' talk! No secrets!
Um, well...
Serina considers...
Even if a temp like me poked my head into that,
we probably wouldn't have many common topics to talk about, but...
It is a chance to gather intelligence.
When Yotsuya and Oozeki start having fun, it should be simple to get them to leak some of Narukozaka's internal info.
I see. I would be delighted to participate.
Now you're talking! I'll get in touch about the specifics later. Leave the organizing to me.
Yumi steps away.
This might be an unexpected opportunity to get close to Narukozaka's secrets.
...Fufufuu♪
And so, the party begins...
What a lovely night view~
At an establishment with a mood like this, I...
...think I'll overeat lots more than I usually do~!
Wow, I figured you were just going to arrange for a place near the company...
Because it's the first Narukozaka Ladies' Party,
y'all want to let loose and party at a stylish place, right!?
Sounds like fun~ I'm getting hungry~
A temp doesn't get paid much, unlike a hostess at a club.
Something wrong, Serina?
No... I just don't come to this kind of place frequently.
I got us a bargain deal on the girls'-only course, so don't worry, it'll be cheap!
You're so good at sorting out these things~
We'll make 'em regret having an all-you-can-drink deal~!
They're... surprisingly considerate.
Oh, well. This is an upfront investment, too.
No price is too high if I can find Narukozaka's secrets. Furthermore...
If I want to become a cool girl, I need to be able to drink in style, too.
Dining Bar "Silver Vine"
I'll take a beer for now! And you, Serina?
Well... I'll have a cassis orange.
A cassis orange~? It's just us girls here, so don't be a little baby~
I can't really hold my alcohol. I apologize...
I can't get completely drunk... ...I still need to get the information out of them.
How about you, Koyui?
Sake, of course~ No other alcohol mixed in! Just sake made with rice~
Just so you know, we took the girls' night course, which doesn't have all-you-can-drink.
And for our dishes, we've got salad, bagna cauda, cheese fondue...
Ah, sake won't pair well with those~ I'll have wine, then~
Now, then! Here's to the twerp-free Narukozaka Ladies' Club...
Cheers!
Cheers!
Cheers!
After a round of drinks...
Without further ado, the staple of ladies' parties...
In Narukozaka... there are no good men.
What about the Commander? Yumi, don't you try to woo him every day~?
That's just it–he doesn't pay attention at all.
Even though I'm inviting him out for drinks every night.
Isn't that because~ you're asking him to your club~?
Well, yeah, two birds with one stone, right?
Nothing wrong with having a date with a hostess.
There's nothing NOT wrong with it...
Ah~ But~ I do know how you feel~
I invite him to lunch and dinner, too~ But it's never gone well~
The Commander's the distant sort, it seems~
Eating with you is kinda, well~ That's probably why he's on guard~
Let's see... Seduction doesn't work on the Commander...noted.
How about you, Serina? What do you think about the Commander?
Ah– There it is.
I'm not sure. I only just started here, so I haven't talked with him much.
Is he your type?
In this sort of case...
Both Yotsuya and Oozeki seem to have a fondness for the Commander, so...
Not in particular, I suppose. I do think he's a good boss.
Aren't there other men in Narukozaka as well? What sorts of people are they?
The Engineering guys?
...Absolutely not.
I've gone drinking with Iwata only once, but...
With the Head Engineer!
Iwata has a grandchild, you know~
No, no. Even I wouldn't go after someone like that.
When it was just Sitara and Fumika in Narukozaka,
there wasn't even a Commander around. I just dragged Iwata along with me for drinks.
Being able to go to a bar that I couldn't really visit by myself was pretty baller.
And he treated me really generously that night.
It would've been perfect if a full lecture wasn't also part of the deal.
The Head Engineer seems easier to get close to than the Commander.
You shouldn't do that, Yumi~ The Head Engineer's too old to be dragged around town so late~
Hm, so Oozeki's keeping an eye on him. In that case...
By the way... There used to be a parts workshop in Narukozaka, right?
I remember hearing that we have a Parts Manufacturing division and an Alice Gear R&D division,
but do we ever interact with them?
The Fuchu factory?
The R&D division got merged into Engineering forever ago. Everyone's here with us now.
And Manufacturing... got restructured too many years ago to count. Nobody young is in it anymore.
Everyone who's left is an ancient engineer on Iwata's level.
Since they lost their point of contact with us on the Actress side of the business, they're basically a different company now.
I'm pretty sure only the Director and Iwata have been there?
If that's the case... Doing anything to them wouldn't be easy.
I guess I'll sneak in if a target of some sort pops up.
Fufufuu... At this rate, I'll be getting that confidential info in no time...
Downtown
Later...
Mmm~, I still haven't had enough. Shall we go to one more place?
I'm getting hungry again too~
Wanna go to an Asian place? Tom yum with coriander sounds good~!
And we can follow it with sake~
Rice is essential as the closer~
No... more... I'm... already...
Just how much can these people drink... All-you-can-drink at two restaurants...
Serina looks to Yumi.
Haven't you drunk enough?
Then, to Koyui.
Haven't you eaten enough?
A'ight~ The night's not over yet, and I'm going to the end!
The fellowship forges on~ Serina, too, come on! We're going~
No... uhh... I, 'm out of cash for the month...
Don't sweat it. It's all my treat tonight.
I've got the best feeling today~
I mi-might be a lil' drunk...
If that's so, I'm sure you can join us for more food at least~
Buh I can only eat so much.
There, there. Just hang around and chat with us, then.
Let's pile on the fun!
Th-This is also... to expose Narukozaka's secrets...
If it's come to this... I'll get you two blackout drunk and wring out every bit of info you have...
A few drinks later...
Bl... Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir!
Leave it to me-ow to pilfer for propriety!
Ahahahaha!
Aaaahahaha~ Serina, you're so funny when you're shitfaced!
My! "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir" brings back so many memories~
I used to play Chat Noir too~ Back in kindergarten.
I'd fight with my friends over who got to be Chat Noir~
S'not playing!
I!
I am Chat Noir!
Aaaaahahaha~ There it is, just like that one girl in my group!
She's certainly reliving her younger days~
Fufufuu... Chat Noir's true identity is need · to · know♪ Promise~
I'm going to dig out all the secrets of Narukozaka!
Aaaahahaha~ Serina, you're the best!!
With how she usually is, it's hard to imagine she could be so playful~
In Front of Narukozaka's Office
The next day – – Niiya Serina was overcome with regret.

chara_Niiya-Serina_3-2.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Um, er... What exactly did I do while I was drunk?
I'm drawing a blank... I didn't do anything rude that time, did I?
The Narukozaka Actresses' Ladies' Party... That night was just terrible...
I meant to get Narukozaka's Actresses drunk, then extract information from them...
On the contrary, I was the one who got drunk, then put up such a shameful act.
Such a dishonor to the name of the Conscientious Corporate Spy, Chat Noir...
No way, Serina~! Last time was the bomb!
Thanks to you, Serina, I had the most wonderfully fun time~
Your true identity is unbelieveable, Serina! That was so wild~
But Serina's true identity is need · to · know~ Eeheehee~
Oh, you right! Sorry, Serina.
Huh?
My true identity...!? I–Just what did I do? I can't remember!!
I... What did I say? Did I admit to something serious...
Well, yeah. It sure made an impact.
I didn't believe my own eyes~
Wha, what did I say? What on earth did I do?
Aaaahahaha, Chat Noir!
You're going to dig out all the secrets of Narukozaka, right~
Eeek!! Wh–why do you know that!!
Oh my god... I can't believe I exposed my true identity and intentions like that...
Ah, don't worry~ We aren't gonna tell anyone.
It'll be a secret between the three of us~!
Uuugh... The idea was for me to probe for their secrets and reveal them...
But now I'm being threatened by my targets instead!!
So... What do you want me to do? What is it that you two want?
That's obvious, isn't it, Koyui?
Yeah~ We won't let you escape~ Eheheh~
Aaaahahaha, I'm looking forward to it~ From this day on.
Kh... I've got to seal these two's mouths somehow...
Or it'd be all over for me... for Chat Noir...
A familiar restaurant
...What are we doing here?
We'll wrap it all up after just one place tonight.
I've... already decided to avoid drinking...
This time we're having a dinner party~
We'll be focusing on good food and chatting this time, with just a smidge of drinking.
You'd be fine with that, right, Serina?
Now that they've learned my secret, I can't say no...
...Yeah.
Koyui recommended this restaurant, so I've got high expectations for the place.
When I was unemployed, I reunited with Rin and the others here~
I met the Commander here, too, I wonder if he remembers~
Huh? Of course he'd remember that. There's no way he could forget.
You could do with being a bit more aware of just how cute you are, Koyui.
Is that so~? Last time we spoke,
he had an odd look on his face, like he barely remembered I was here~
You're just imagining it. C'mon, let's drink and forget.
You're right~ Today, I'm... I'm gonna drink~
I don't understand what they're really after... But I'll turn this around and seize their secrets.
Here's to Narukozaka's Actresses! Cheers~!
The party goes on...
What does this mean? None of these topics have anything to do with my identity or purpose.
I figured they were just demanding something casually, but...
If they have no intentions to negotiate right away, why invite me along...?
Honestly~ All those little twerps are just impossible~
Whenever they open their mouths, it's always "grandma" this, "hag" that, totally rude~
No matter how much I hear it, it still hurts right here.
Hmm~ That just goes to show how much they adore you, doesn't it?
Besides, only Sitara and Fumika ever say things like that~
I've worked together with them for a long time now.
When they were still new, I made them run errands for me and such~
You had them do those kinds of things?
That would probably explain why they call you "grandma"...
Serina sinks into her thoughts...
It can't be!? Now that they have my secret, will I also be...
Have I been misunderstanding Narukozaka's interpersonal relationships all this time?
I thought for sure that the Commander was a figurehead and that Fumika held the real power with the Director's blessing,
But the true power behind the throne who's opposing the Fumika faction is... Yotsuya!?
The hidden Director who controls Narukozaka from the shadows, their true identity couldn't possibly be...
Of course! Everything lines up when one thinks about it that way!
Being lent to Nakano, too; was that to grasp the true condition of Empire Nakano and acquire it!?
And having the skill to discover my true identity and completely ensnare me.
There's no mistake! Narukozaka's Director is...
I swear to God, that Director of ours~ Would it kill her to show up at the company again~?
Here I am handling all the newcomer training. How do they expect me to go on without some extra pay to show for it?
Narukozaka's Director~? I'd like to meet them one day~
What kind of person are they?
She's way more of a hag than me.
Aaanywho. What brand of Dress Gear do you use, Serina?
It's a lightweight set focusing on mobility. Nothing expensive.
Ooh, a lightweight set, not a bad choice.
If you care about balance in your gear at all, it's just so hard to avoid looking fat.
And if you focus on stability and firepower, you always end up having a heavy loadout~
Maybe I should just go for it and have my equipment go on a diet too~
They dodged my question with Actress-specific Gear fashion talk!?
But, you know~ I wouldn't win even if I use my slim body as a selling point~
Against the legit Chat Noir, Serina! Aaaahahaha!
No matter how much I diet, it figures I wouldn't be any match for you~
Wa–wait. Why are you saying that so loudly?
You promised to keep it a secret that I'm Chat Noir...
"I'm Chat Noir"!? You're going along with it now, Serina?
Are you going to show that to us again~?
Eh, no, what're you...?
The gang notices you.
Ah, Commander...
What's the matter? Why are you here?

commands.command: Just for a meal.

items.text: What a coincidence~ If it's no trouble, would you like to join us?
A coincidence? Really? Could the Commander have been looking into my movements...?

commands.command: I tailed you here!

items.text: Whaaat? Commander, are you worried about us?
We were tailed? Without me noticing a thing?
The Commander... can't be underestimated!

commands.command: I heard you were having an adult ladies' party!

items.text: You want to join in? That's pretty shameless.
Now, now, it's fine, isn't it?
Commander, come and join us~
Joining in on his subordinates' girls' night!? What's he trying to pull!?

chara_Niiya-Serina_3-2.text: This is bad... If my true identity gets exposed in front of the Commander...
My Narukozaka investigation will be cut short!
You came at a great time, Commander~ Things were just getting exciting~
You see, Serina is...
You made a promise, Miss Yotsuya.
It's all good. The Commander's an adult, too, so he wouldn't make fun of you or anything.
I already can't wait for Serina's Chat Noir thing~
...I can't believe it!
How could you blurt out a secret so easily!
Serina's parlor trick is just amazing, see.
Parlor trick?
Your "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir" impression's just like the real thing~
Impression?
Heard of the show, Commander? Everyone in our generation still remembers it, but...
It was about "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir"!?
So that's what I did when I was drunk...
Let's have Serina do it here~
If she does, it'll all come back to the Commander for sure~
I'm sorry... I definitely can't, not while sober...
Gotcha, Serina. Sorry I asked for something so crazy.
Miss... Yotsuya...
Let's drink, y'all! Until Serina's plastered enough to show us her cabaret act!
In your dreams!

chara_Niiya-Serina_3-3.text: The blue sky stretches overhead.
Serina: Why did I wind up here?
Serina: The sky... I hate this blue sky.

Serina: Its clarity, so sheer and absolute.
...I hate it.
Serina: As if even my sins are clear beneath it...
Serina: The clouds... I hate these white clouds, too.
Serina: Drifting in the air with such serenity… So pale and pure.
Serina: ...I hate them.
Serina: They're like me before I committed my sins...
Serina: I hate this blue sky.
Serina stands on the shoreline, facing the ocean.
Serina: Why did I wind up here?
Serina: The sea... I hate this blue sea.
Serina: The shoreline, washed over by waves again and again. I hate it, too.
Serina: And the tides, ebbing and flowing, condemning me on every approach. I hate them, too.
Serina: At my first workplace,
Serina: I realized the dictatorial president was tampering with the accounting to enrich his own pockets.
Serina: –I couldn't do anything.
Serina: The company was small, and since I had no diploma or qualifications, I was barely hired.
Serina: –I didn't want to quit.
Serina: For the sake of my parents, who had to close down their small factory;
Serina: for the sake of my sister, who wanted to continue her education–
Serina: –No. I was afraid.
Serina: Of losing my position, of losing the company at which I worked.
Serina: Before I could take any kind of action–
Serina: –the company abruptly went bankrupt, murdered by its sloppy accounting.
Serina: –Even if I ignore misdeeds, even if I convince myself that all is well, they will come to a close anyway.
Serina leaps into the darkness as Chat Noir.
Serina: Since that's the case, I won't overlook wrongdoing any longer.
Serina: I will shine a light on it for the glaring world to see.
Serina: Thus, I have– –resolved to live within the darkness.
At the park, Serina contemplates.
Serina: But then... Why did I wind up here?
You're here... for the girls' party!
All right~ The yakisoba's nice and cooked~
You didn't have to have the girls' party at a beachfront park, did you?
This all-Actress barbeque is a sign of a flourishing life!
If I don't take a pic and post it onto my feed, everyone's gonna make fun of me.
I'll upload a sparkling photo that'll make those twerps shut up!
Are you still up to that?
Never change, Narukozaka, never change.
Rei was worried about you~
She thought it was her fault that you stopped showing up~
Well, that's why I'm here at this girls' party.
Please, both of you, tell Rei, the Commander, and whoever else is concerned–
–that I'm doing well.
Ah, what to do~
Noooo, that's such a hassle~ Put your big-girl panties on and tell them yourself!
But it's kind of awkward for me to meet them now.
Don't worry. You'll meet them soon enough.
Serina is surprised.
Will twenty helpings be enough~? For the yakisoba~
T-Twenty? Don't tell me...
When I invited you, I said it exact, right?
That it was a "Narukozaka Actresses' Ladies' Party".
I thought... you meant the same guests as the last few proceedings.
Those... were adult women's parties, remember?
All the girls from Narukozaka are coming today~
Serina bows.
...Th–thank you.
No need to thank us.
Instead... We're looking forward to your hard work~
Eh? For what?
Isn't that obvious?
The Serina specialty~
Your "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir" parlor trick!!
Your "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir" parlor trick!!
I'm waiting for your purr-fect impression♪
We're all gonna have so much fun~
Please, anything but that...
And yet, somewhere in the party, Serina caved. Narukozaka's younger Actresses couldn't believe their eyes...
Bl... Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir!
L... Leave it to me-ow to pilfer for propriety!
Fufufuu... Chat Noir's true identity is need · to · know♪ Promise~

chara_Niiya-Serina_4-1.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Alice Gear Maintenance Bay
One day, Serina's personal Combat Suit arrived...
Thinking about it, this... Isn't this kind of a bad idea?
It's too much like Chat Noir...
Both the once-popular anime character in "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir"
and the Chat Noir making trouble in Tokyo Shard right now...
...It's too similar.
Well, how's it feelin'? Settlin' in pretty quickly, aren't yer?
It really fits you perfectly, Serina!
Thank you very much.
I never thought you would order a personal Combat Suit for me.
...Even though I joined as a temp office clerk rather than a registered Actress.
Goes to show how much th' Commander and th' company's expectin' out of yer.
We'd like ter see yer keep on workin' hard from here on out, yer hear?
Yes, I'll do my best.
But... This Suit...
Whassat? If yer got a problem, pipe up.
Isn't it too similar? ...To Chat Noir, I mean.
Ah! I was wondering why it looked so familiar! So Chat Noir was what it was!
What's this Shah-no... whate'er thing?
You don't know about it, Mister Iwata?
"Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir". It's an anime.
Aruto, yer still haven't grown outta that kinda crap?
It's normal for our generation.
Besides, Chat Noir was popular when I was a kid.
We all saw it, right, Serina?
Most certainly. And recently, in the news...
Apparently that Chat Noir looks pretty similar too!
Ah, yeh... Been hearin' there's some kinda corporate spy out there nowadays.
Not a corporate spy, a femme fatale who punishes corrupt companies!
An' yer sayin' this here Combat Suit's too similar to 'em?
It's the spitting image of what Anna showed on the news the other day!
How did this happen...
Yer ne'er gave any specifics for the looks, right?
You sure you didn't ask to look just like Chat Noir?
I definitely didn't.
I know yer asked fer a suit specializin' in high-speed combat and emphasizin' flexibility and agility.
I have no complaints on that front.
It's designed wi' light equipment, t' maximize speed and agility.
And it's got black stealth coatin' fer fightin' a' night an' in space.
Serina nods.
Exactly as ordered.
I ain't seein' th' problem.
You're right, but...
It should've been designed so the Actress wearing it can fight in a great mood,
using questionnaires and psychology tests designed to figure out what she likes at a deep unconscious level.
And the result is... this personal Combat Suit...
If th' performance ain't an issue, why do yer hafta worry 'bout how it looks?
Nothing to be embarrassed about! It suits you!
If yer really don't like it, yer can request an exchange–
–and get it remade, but...
It's gotta start all o'er again from th' design phase,
so it's gonna cost jus' as much as makin' a new Suit.
...Give me a little time to think about it.
Serina thinks to herself...
"Because I am that Chat Noir on the news"...
...I can't possibly use such a reason for an exchange.
Narukozaka supplied me with a personal Combat Suit even despite its financial struggles right now...
I'd be betraying the hopes of the Commander and everyone else...
But... I've got a bad feeling...
I... What should I do...

chara_Niiya-Serina_4-2.text: Theme Park
Bl... Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir!
L... Leave it to me-ow to pilfer for propriety!
Whooooooa... It's Chat Noir!
Hey– Hey– Are you the real one?
Are you the real Chat Noir?
Eh!? Th-that's right.
Woooooooow~ It's the real Chat Noir–
But, you know... Chat Noir's true identity is need · to · know♪ Promise~
I got it–
Need · to · know♪ Promise.
Ooooh... What have I done to deserve this...?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Training Gym
Three days ago–
Serina looks at her personal Suit again...
Thinking about it, this... Isn't this kind of a bad idea?
It's too much like Chat Noir...
Both the once-popular anime character in "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir"
and the Chat Noir making trouble in Tokyo Shard right now...
...It's too similar.
....convincing!
What's the matter, Sitara?
Miss Serina, you're so convincing~
Convincing? ...What do you mean?
Convincing as Chat Noir!
...I knew it.
That's a perfect "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir" look you've got.
Finally, Narukozaka's own coser Actress joins the fray!
"Coser"?
Short for cosplayer.
Co-cosplay!?
But it is a cosplay, right?
This is... It's not what you think it is...
Gotcha– So, then, Miss Serina, you're just trying not to let the cat out of the bag–
Eh? What does she mean?
Your persona was so beyond flawless that even I, Sitara, was fooled all this time...
It can't be! She's found me out as Chat Noir?
Come out with it, Miss Serina~
Eh? My true identity can't very well be...
If you're an otaku, say you're an otaku! You could've talked to me from the start...
...Oh, phew.
At Narukozaka, all geeks are welcome. No need to force yourself into a normal person act!
I'll tell everybody all smooth-like for you.
Eeh, you'll, what do you...
Leeeeave it to me!
Sitara runs off...
Eeeh!?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Later...
I heard the whole story from Sitara...
Miss Serina.
Wh–what is it?
I understand that you're Chat Noir.
Pl-please wait a minute!
It's all a misunderstanding! It's just a coincidence my personal Combat Suit is...
A coincidence... Such an excuse doesn't pass muster in society.
I heard the same thing when I spoke to Yumi and Miss Koyui.
Eeh?
Don't tell me the Commander and Rei revealed my true identity as well...!?
Miss Serina. I'd expect you to know this, but-
There happens to be a thing known as "copyright".
Uh... I don't quite follow your...
Do you have a license for the "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir" IP?
Oh... That's what she meant.
But, this was designed by an AEGIS-designated Combat Suit maker...
If, by some chance, Narukozaka were to receive a damage claim, it'd be too late..
At any rate, we have to run it by the publisher!
After some waiting, Fumika returns...
Miss Serina, good news!
We've obtained permission!
Er... Then, this custom Combat Suit is–
Completely fine.
It seems that they'd like you to actively involve yourself in Actress work and spread their name.
Since they're planning to rerelease "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir" in a remastered box set...
"This chance at publicity came at just the right time," they said with enthusiasm!
I'll negotiate the sponsorship fee!
Making a long story short, you'll be treated as the official Actress for "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir".
It'd be great if you and Narukozaka could split the sponsorship fee in twain, Serina!
And we can formalize the contract later.
H–hey, wait, this situation's escalating too...
You realize that an uproar will ensue if we don't make this official, yes?
Th... That's true.
And by the way... The other party did mention that they had one condition.
A condition?
Back to the present...
Bl... Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir!
L... Leave it to me-ow to pilfer for propriety!
The remastered box set comes out next year!
A nostalgic yet fresh encounter is waiting for you!
I'll be taking your heart now♪
Ooooh... What have I done to deserve this...?

chara_Niiya-Serina_4-3.text: Kita Electric Group HQ Office
Serina infiltrates another company building one night...
Thinking about it, this... Isn't this kind of a bad idea?
It's too much like Chat Noir...
Both the once-popular anime character in "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir"
and the Chat Noir making trouble in Tokyo Shard right now...
...It's too similar.
Not good, don't go there; back to work, focus on work...
Serina accesses their systems...
Stealing evidence of injustice from corrupt companies...
That's the job of Chat Noir!
Some other day...
It's that time you've all been waiting for–our weekly Pick-Up Actress corner!
Our guest tonight is an Actress who's rapidly climbing in popularity thanks to her personal Combat Suit.
From Narukozaka Manufacturing, it's Niiya Serina!
A pleasure to meet you all. I am Niiya Serina.
Looking at you up close, you really are exactly like "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir".
You must be a big fan of Chat Noir, I take it?
Of course.
...Though, as much as I'd like to say that, I've only watched the show in my childhood.
That's no surprise, everyone in our generation loved her when they were kids.
You're also doing promotional activities as the official Actress of "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir",
and you've got the image down perfectly!
Since Chat Noir's heroine, Sorori Nekomi, is a junior high school student...
It's impossible for me to get every detail right, so I apologize...
Oh, not at all! Chat Noir becomes sexy and cool after she transforms, just like you.
That, well... I don't think I can do that, either...
Have some confidence in yourself! You're doing great.
The program is suddenly interrupted...
We have breaking news!
We interrupt this scheduled Pick-Up Actress segment for a special news bulletin!
Early this morning, confidential data was leaked from the main office of Kita Electric Group...
...highlighting a possible violation of the Securities Exchange Act. The Tokyo District Public Procecutors Office is dispatching investigators in response and will search the company's premises soon.
Once again, a claim of responsibility has been left by Chat Noir.
Stay tuned for updates–I'm Usamoto Anna, reporting live.
They now return to their regularly scheduled program.
Wow~, Chat Noir claims yet another accomplishment for herself.
Yes, that's true.
This Suit just doesn't feel right. It's like my true identity is exposed...
What do you think? How are you feeling right now?
Um... What do you mean by that? I'm not exactly connected to...
But you are, aren't you?
As the official Actress of "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir", what do you think of that Chat Noir?
Um, well... I do think she's incredible.
Realer than the real thing?
Uh–I'm not the real Chat Noir...
...Hm? But you are the official Actress, right?
I'm the real thing in that sense, but...
Er, um... The real thing is the anime's "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir",
while this Chat Noir is a mysterious person borrowing that name to punish corporate crime.
And me, who happened to have an identical personal Suit and became the official Actress...
Oh no, oh no, it's ever so tangled...
What's the matter? Is something on your mind?
Eeek!
N–nothing at all.
Now that there's an official Actress, I'd love for that Chat Noir to be caught.
Wh... why?
Because to me, Actresses make much better heroes for the little girls out there.
Even though she's doing good deeds, that Chat Noir is still sneaking into companies and stealing information.
That's true...
How about we have a showdown right here!
Showdown... What kind of showdown?
That's obvious! Chat Noir versus Chat Noir!
The official Actress versus the modern lady thief! Let's settle the score on who's the cool cat and who's the copycat!
Eh... Eeeeeeeeeh!?
They're both the same cat! Both of them are really me!
Chat Noir, if you're watching this program, please come to the TV station right away.
Let's decide which one is real tonight!
Eeeeeeeh!? W–Wait a second–
And so, that night...
Usamoto, reporting in! We are live in the vicinity of the TV station!
Will we see Chat Noir make her appearance?
What say you, Niiya Serina, official Actress of "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir"?
Yes... er... I doubt Chat Noir will come.
If she doesn't show up, then you, Official Actress Niiya Serina, are the real "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir".
I'm afraid your name would be taken then, other Chat Noir!
W–Wait~ You can't just decide that on your own~
According to the "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir" production team, you, Serina, are the real deal.
Having a fake around is no-good-at-all!
But "she" couldn't possibly come here if I'm already here...
Chat Noir is in her greatest pinch yet!
But suddenly, Chat Noir appears on camera...
Eeh! But how is that...
It's Chat Noir, right before our eyes! Chat Noir has arrived on the scene, everyone.
This Chat Noir turns towards Serina.
...both do our best.
Farewell.
And she leaves...
And Chat Noir leaps away after giving a word of encouragement to Serina!
Wait– Let me get an interview! I'd like to ask you a few questions!
Anna rushes after Chat Noir...
What... did I just...
Later that night...
Urban-style Ninjutsu: Shadow Clone Technique!
Raiya is giving a demonstration of what just happened.
I made a Chat Noir with my Ultracompact Illusion Projector!
Um... Since you seemed to be in a fix when I saw you on TV, Miss Serina, I asked Miss Kaeruzaka for help.
Thank you so much for helping me out of that unexpected situation.
Nonono, it was no problem at all.
At any rate... How come you two weren't surprised by this holoprojector at all?
Let me guess...
Are you two interested in Urban-style Ninjutsu?
Hmm... Perhaps.
Anyway, thank you, you two.
I never thought the two of you would come to my rescue.
We're all... colleagues, fellow Actresses...
I believe that is what Yotsuyu would say.
As for myself, with my ninjutsu... Secret support is my métier!
Anyway, I should be going.
Kaede excuses herself.
Fare thee well.
And Raiya does too.
...Thank you.
Niiya Serina–
At times, a brilliant temp clerk.
At times, a registered Actress under Narukozaka.
At yet other times, the official Actress of "Black Cat Phantom Thief Chat Noir", certified by its producers.
But right now, she dons her true guise– The black cat dashing in the dark, the modern lady thief. Chat Noir!
But, you know... Chat Noir's true identity is need · to · know♪ Promise~
Now, it's time... to get to work.

chara_Nikotama-Mai_1-1.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Training Gym
Mm... Ah, sorry. I'm a little nervous...
Talking one-on-one with... a man... I've only really done that... with my dad...
Do your best, Tama-chan. I'll hang around just next door.
If the Commander sexually harrasses you any, I'll fly right back to save you!
Sitara steps away.
Hyah!
C-Commander... You're not pretending to interview me... for sexual harrassment... are you?

commands.command: Could I ask you to trust me?

items.text: Y-you're right, I should...
I was just... scared by... Sitara's usual silliness...

commands.command: If you wish.

items.text: N-no thanks...
I-I... I have... faith in you... Commander...

chara_Nikotama-Mai_1-1.text: B-but, we are... a guy and a girl... alone in a locked room... right now...
A situation like this...
Ah, no... Sorry, forget I said anything...
U-umm... I should probably introduce myself or something...
I'm... Nikotama... Mai, a second year at Touin High...
Ah, it's, the same school Sitara goes to...
I'm a Sagittarius with AB blood type... And for clubs... I don't go to any.
Er... um... My favorite thing is, cake... I guess?
My hobbies are... I game with Sitara pretty often...
And I like to... read manga... and novels too.
I have some confidence in... my stamina and flexibility... just a little though.
I also like... to dance... I've been doing ballet... since I was young...
My mom... she does competitive dancing... And my dad is a choreographer...
Someone I respect... Miss Origa... maybe?
Ah, she's a prima ballerina at the National Ballet Theatre over at Moscow Shard.
Though... she might be retiring pretty soon...
Ah, s-sorry... for... going off topic...
I just... can't find the right things to say... when I'm nervous...
U-umm... can I still become a good Actress... even if I'm like this?
I do have a license, but I... don't really have any experience, so I'm w-worried...

commands.command: I think everyone's like that at the start.

items.text: Y-you're right... Nobody... starts out perfect...
I... feel a bit better now.

commands.command: That's what commanders like me are for. I'll support you.

items.text: T-thank you so much.
Waaait a minute. You never said those things to me, Commander!
How come Tama-chan gets all the favoritism!?

chara_Nikotama-Mai_1-1.text: U-uhm... I... I'll... give it a try...
I... don't know... how much aptitude I really have...
But... I'll try... to be useful as an Actress.
I can't really handle... showing up in public, but... I'll be fine if it's Vice.
Mai suddenly hides.
Erm... Uhm... Sorry, but... please... don't look at me in the eye so much...
It makes me nervous... and my voice... gets stuck in my throat...
Sitara returns...
Hey Commander, we've got a job!
...and notices Mai hiding behind something.
...Wait, huh?
Tama-chan...? Why're you hiding? Don't tell me he actually sexually harassed you?
Umm... Er... That's not it, Sitara.
But I mean, when you're hiding yourself like that...
I'm... actually trying my best not to run away.
Oh, good! That's the spirit! C'mon, it's sortie time. We've got a mission.
Mai comes back out.
Um... Er... Commander... I'll see you later...
Nikotama Mai... ready... for sortie.

chara_Nikotama-Mai_2-1.text: An intersection in West Shinjuku
Wait, really?
It was just a glimpse, but apparently a friend of mine saw it.
No idea about her name or what she looks like, but they were sure that person was an Actress at our place.
Like, it wasn't a large-scale event or anything, but she was still selling doujinshi, right?
You sure she's someone at Narukozaka?
Mmm... Iunno, maybe they just saw it wrong.
I can't think of anyone with those kinds of hobbies in our company anyways...
Maybe they're hiding it? If she's one of us, I'd love to get to know her.
You sure get real assertive when it comes to those things, Tama-chan...
Ah, I forgot! I'll be a bit late today, gotta stop by at Yodobashi.
Can you let Fumika know for me?
...You can't just send her an email?
Nah, a message saying "I'll be late, gonna go buy snack toys" would let her blackmail me forever...
Ah... You can count on me, then! I'll go on ahead!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
You saw it too, right, Commander? The design for my personal Suit?
I knew it was gonna take everything I had, but whoo boy, that was rough...
Just saying, but... I'm the only person here who can draw with that kind of artistic sense.
And I don't think it can get much better from there, not anytime soon.
Mai arrives.
D-do you draw, Miss Yumi!?
Ah, did you overhear us?
Y-yes... The "I'm the only person here who can draw with that kind of artistic sense" part...
Well, not to brag, but I do think I did a pretty good job drawing it out.
D-don't tell me Miss Yumi was a "closet fan"...
No, she's open about it... even confidently declaring it.
That reminds me, I see a lot of older sister characters like Miss Yumi in the evergreen genres too...
Er... Umm... Wh-what kind of style... do you draw in?
Cleanliness with white as the main theme to appeal to people's sense of beauty, I guess?
Not to brag, but I'm a traditionalist, me.
I-I see! Just because the characters are adults doesn't mean it has to be adult-only...
Miss Yumi normally looks so fancy, but... "traditionalist"... does she mean original works? Is she planning to go pro!?
<i>She's said nothing about it so far, but is she planning to attend an event to get reviews?
Either way, cleanliness, huh... Maybe it's the kind of doujinshi that ends before the characters do the deed?
Those really get you wondering where you can read the next part...
But, if you take that itself into account... then it might just work!
Y-you're right... cleanliness is important.
Well, some people did misunderstand it and call it grotesque.
Hyah!
Y-your art is that intense?
It seems pretty normal to me, but not everyone has a sense of beauty, sadly.
So she draws intense stuff while saying it's normal with a straight face...
And...did she say the G-word!? Is Miss Yumi actually super dark on the inside!?
Well, it depends on the tastes of the viewer too.
G-good point... Some people do like that genre...
It did turn out a bit eccentric when I put the idea down on paper though.
I mean, kids are gonna see it too.
Huuuh!?
Y-you're going to let children see it too?
Well, yeah, you have to make that kind of stuff okay to see for everyone.
Can't really hide it just from the kids.
Eh...huh!? F-for children...!?
Is this... what they call an elite education!?
B-but... won't it be too graphic for...?
What're you on about?
I'd even consider that kind of elegance to be perfect for developing kids' artistic senses.
Y-you're really confident...
Of course I am! I'm the one putting in the work and fighting out there.
Eh? What? Wh-what's the matter all of a sudden...?
Miss Yumi... I was just thinking... you're an absolute god...
I wish I had the courage to say it so openly like you...
You can do it too, Mai. You like it quite a bit, right?
To tell the truth... I love it.
There you go then. "Do what you love and love what you do," as they say.
A-alright... I'll... give it my best too...!
Yeah... I can't just run away with the "I only read" excuse.
Fumika arrives from school.
Oh? What have you two been talking about?
Just a small discussion on art.
Miss Yumi's advice... has been very enlightening!
Huh... So Mai wanted to reference my Suit design...
That explains why she praised me so much.
There's a doujinshi convention coming soon, so I'm gonna be busy with...
A-a doujinshi convention...!?
Is something the matter?
No, not really... Come on, let's get to work, get to work...
The literature girl showed a bitter smile when thinking about her recent failure...
Of bringing her uninteresting pure-literature doujinshi to a convention, and not managing a single sale.

chara_Nikotama-Mai_3-1.text: A shopping mall
Wow, the line... has already gotten so long...
Yeah, I knew catching the first train was a good idea.
The limited edition was this close to slipping away from me.
The universal bottom is getting put on top for the first time this issue. Can't wait to see it.
We have an emergency announcement for everyone attending the sale today!
A-an emergency?
Don't tell me...
Is it gonna be one per customer!? I'd hate if I couldn't buy two more copies for safekeeping and preaching...
１限 (Ichi-gen): Doujinshi convention term for purchase limits, in this case one per customer.
No, stop thinking about negative things. I have to be a positive girl.
Stay positive, positive...
Maybe... The author might be here to sign books or something!
That'd be lucky.
Uh, we've received a notice that-
-the freighter carrying the books was destroyed by a Vice attack.
Since our stock of books has not arrived,
I regret to announce that today's event has been cancelled.
We apologize for the disappointment, but we hope for your understanding!
Uh, excuse me, Miss? Are you alright?
Eeeeeh!?!?!?
B-but... I... needed those books...
Er... uh...
We are equally as troubled as you...
But um...
I...I lined up for... four whole hours...!
Even if you say so...
We're deeply sorry, but the books we were planning to sell won't be arriving...
I-is there... anything you can do at all?
I-I'm begging you!
Ah, sorry, but... you begging us doesn't give us the power to...
Aww, noooo...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Later in the day...
Found it. This would be that destroyed freighter you're talking about.
Its cargo was... lots and lots of books, yeah.
Yumi pulls up more info on her workstation.
And it was scheduled to arrive at Tokyo Shard's Port Ariake too.
Wait, but wasn't this...
What's the matter?
Nah, nothing much.
Weird... I think this was the ship Ginny destroyed...
Not really sure why she did it, but... probably better if Mai didn't hear about that.
Unlucky you, Mai.
Oh, the limited-edition book that should've been in my hands...
Vice... How unforgivable...
M-Mai's giving off an unspeakable aura...
Oh yeah. On the bright side, they're planning to ship it again in four days.
F-four days...!
Mai comes up to you.
Commander...!
Um... If they hire us for anything...
Make sure... to send me for it... Thanks.
I swear to myself I will defend the books to the end this time...
Are those books that important?
I... really wanted them. I was gonna buy three copies.
Eh? Three copies of the same book?
Ah, er... uhh...
Crap... She probably wouldn't understand if I tell her it's for preaching...
U-umm... one for reading... another for safekeeping...
And the third?
I-I can't say it... not that it's preaching material...
Erm... To donate to the library... I guess?
To the library? Wow, that's amazing!
Yotsuyu... You're, such a good girl...
I'm so sorry... for lying to someone like you...
I... always buy three copies... of any book I like...
I'm really curious about what books would get you to go so far!
Please show them to me next time!
Hyah!
Uh, should I... not have asked?
Wh-what do I do...
I do want to convert more people, but this is in the complete wrong direction to Yotsuyu's...
S-sure... I'll show you next time...!
Thank you! Mmm, I'm so excited!
Ah... I blurted it out...
Touin Academy Campus · High School Building
The next day...
Oh god, you promised her that?
For a moment, I was hoping maybe she'd understand...
You think... it was too rash of me?
Mmm, Yotsuyu's not really a geek, yeah.
She seems super normal to me.
True...
But, I don't want to make her sad...
I should really find a good way to refuse her...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Let's see, where are you, Yotsuyu...
Mai finds Yotsuyu quickly, but...
-So, she promised to show them to me.
Ah, Miss Mai!
Could we ask to see your books as well?
Oh, don't worry.
I'm not one to speak ill of someone else's tastes.
But I must admit that I am curious about the books a peasant would go such lengths to obtain.
Yotsuyu... Did she just... tell everyone about...
We were just talking about how caring you were, Mai.
Er... Um... Uhh...
It'll be so much fun.
Mhm~
I-if I showed everyone, they'd... they'd definitely misunderstand.
Ah, I mean, they wouldn't be wrong, but...
Wh-what do I do now?

chara_Nikotama-Mai_3-2.text: The same shopping mall
An impulsive act of rashness can thrust a human being into the deepest of predicaments.
Nikotama Mai's current situation is a great example.
Carelessly, she had promised to show Yotsuyu and Co her darkest secret:
The doujinshi that she so enjoys.
Oh? What's this list?
I was drawing up a list of books that'd be fine for Yotsuyu and the others to see.
Could you look through it for me, Sitara?
Oh, okay! Pass it over.
Nikotama Mai hands the list to Sitara.
Let's see... Hmm...
I tried to avoid potential landmines as much as I could,
so I think these choices should all be pretty safe?
It's all carefully handpicked; I had to cut out a lot of candidates~
...What's the matter?
Noooo!
Eeeeh!?
Tama-chan, your choices are way too aggressive! Normal people aren't gonna be able to handle this kinda stuff.
T-that bad?
Just look at how sticky this one is!
I mean, weren't we talking about how Yotsuyu was going for Kaede the other day?
So I figured something along those lines might be easier for her to get used to.
Yotsuyu herself doesn't need to know your fantasies!
Mai begins to imagine...
"Kaede finds Yotsuyu with this book in hand..."
"My, what is this that you are reading?"
"No... th-this isn't what you're..."
"Impossible... Yotsuyu... I..."
"You've got it wrong! This is, er..."
"As Yotsuyu tries to explain while blushing, Kaede gets closer to her cheeks and-"
Stop! Stooop!
"3D equals tragedy" as the saying goes... So let's not ship people we know, okay?
So precious...
Me likey...
NOT!
If it gets out, they'll label you a degen behind your back!
I-I'd die... It'd be the end of me!
Downtown
Two days later...
How did I let this happen...
I can't believe I left the sample books I brought to the office in the locker room.
Even the softcore ones were bad enough that Sitara yelled at me.
If Yotsuyu and the others see a hardcore book like one of those...
NOOOOOO!
Uh, excuse me... Are you okay?
Huh?
You... were screaming just now, right?
If you're in pain anywhere, I can call an ambulance for you?
S-sorry, I'm completely fine!
That's not good... The thought was so embarrassing, I screamed out loud...
I have to retrieve the books before everyone shows up.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Thank god... I made it...
I'll be fine. Gotta have confidence.
The god of yuri and yaoi is with me.
...Wait, huh?
Mai sees Yotsuyu, Aika and Ayaka, who are looking at books across the room...
Whoa... This art is pretty good...
But it does seem a little distasteful, wouldn't you say?
Certainly far too unreal for my tastes.
But the colors are so unique, and there are pretty pictures too.
D-don't tell me... Are those...
Ah, hey Mai!
Thanks for going through the trouble of leaving the books here for us.
We decided to have a look before you came back.
Ha... haha...
Mai collapses...
Whoa! Mai!?
What happened!?
Er... it looks like Mai fainted...
It's over... It's all over...
O Lord... Is this a trial I must overcome?
Ah, Mai. I'm so glad you're awake.
Y-yeah... Though if this is a dream... then I want to wake up.
We checked out those books of yours.
They definitely might be valuable enough that a library would want them.
Eh?
I wanted to get a copy myself too, but I looked them up and they were all out-of-print already.
Wh-what're you talking about?
Your collection. It was wonderful.
As Aikawa Aika said so, she presented the books to Mai:
A few collections of American superhero comics, bright with their garishly-colored covers.
H-huh? I don't get it.
I've never even seen these American comic books.
And it's amazing that you're reading them in the original language as well, Miss Mai.
My English isn't all that great either, but it'd be a blast if I could learn with these.
Um... What about the other books?
These were the only ones we found...?
Really? You didn't see any especially thin ones?
I mean, I think these American comics are pretty thin by themselves.
I-I'm still confused, but this has to be a miracle.
The god of yuri and yaoi really does exist...
In truth, the books are from Virginia's collection, planted by quick-witted Sitara.
In other words, it was actually the two members of Tri-Stella☆ who had saved her.
But Nikotama Mai, having narrowly avoided this life-and-death crisis, would indulge in happiness on her own for the next little while.

chara_Nikotama-Mai_3-3.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Our closet geek Actress Nikotama Mai stands vigilant in the office.
All her worries directed towards one thing and one thing alone:
The reshipping of a minor doujinshi⁠ that is set to occur on this very day, four days after the original supply was lost to Vice attack⁠.
U-umm... Commander...
Mai looks around the empty office...
E-everyone's... so late today.
Fumika... and Kaede... are taking exams at Seiou... I think...
But, if we've gotten no contacts, then those books are probably safely shipped by now.
If I take the first train to the Ariake event again tomorrow, I'm sure I'll be able to buy it this time...
I'll head back early then, Commander. See you la-
But suddenly, a transmission...
Narukozaka Manufacturing, please acknowledge.
A freighter enroute to Port Ariake is currently under Vice attack.
Eeh!?
The ship's security contractor is requesting reinforcements.
If that freighter gets destroyed, who knows when they'll be able to try shipping that limited-edition doujinshi again...
What do I do... Ginny's still suspended...
And Sitara is on a field trip to the TV studio.
If it's come to this, then I've no choice but...
I-I'll... sortie.
By yourself, Mai?
Y-yes... But... I'll be fine.
Narukozaka has the final say, but... what will you do, Commander?
Commander, please send me.

commands.command: It's too dangerous to go alone, Mai.

items.text: I'll be fine. Let me go.
Please.

commands.command: There's no point in taking this mission.

items.text: Th-that's not true!
That freighter is carrying something very important.

chara_Nikotama-Mai_3-3.text: Th-this might be... a bit of a weird time to say this, but...
To be honest... I-I...
I only joined at the start... because Sitara invited me...
And I've been... leaning on her and Ginny... and fighting mostly because it was interesting...
B-but... Things... are different now.
Um... Er... I don't know how to put this well... but, fighting together with everyone...
And gathering confidence from that, bit by bit... really slowly...
It might just... help me be myself better... even if just a little...
That's... how I've been feeling...
Maybe I'm... a bit different from normal people...
B-but...
I like that about myself...
And I want to like myself... even more!
A-and... No matter how everyone else... looks at me...
I-I'll... always love... the books I love.
That... I'll never budge on.
An Actress... doesn't just... fight Vice.
They... protect the feelings... of other people too.

commands.command: Alright then. Go protect the thing you love.

items.text: Y-yessir!
Nikotama Mai, heading out.

commands.command: Our company's full of stubborn Actresses, huh.

items.text: T-that's right...
So I won't back down either...
Please let me sortie!

chara_Nikotama-Mai_3-3.text: Enter Fumika.
Hold on a second!
F-Fumika...
Looks like I was right to stop by after my exams ended.
I'll go with you.
As lacking as it may be to have me rather than your two Tri-Stella☆ teammates.
No, that's not true.
You being here is... reassuring!
Let's go, then.
Yeah!
In open space...
Come and face me, Vice...
Those limited editions, filled with everyone's dreams and love...
I'll never let you touch them!
The usual shopping mall
The next day...
At a certain doujinshi sale in Ariake, Mai is spotted in queue.
Oh? I think this customer lined up the last time too...
But she's asleep... That's not good...
And the book she wanted is finally here too...
She lies asleep in a corner of the venue, despite having arrived early from the first train.
Though her expression—filled with the sense of accomplishment from defending the books—is a mysteriously serene one.

chara_Nikotama-Mai_4-1.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
What do I do... Sitara even said she'd be here early, but...
The silence is so crushing with just the two of us...
Mai looks to Rei across the room, who is also waiting.
Rei is pretty quiet too...
Maybe I should wait outside until Sitara or Ginny shows up...
Nuh-uh, I shouldn't. If I shy away now, then...
And I finally had a personal Suit made for me too. I can't lean on my two friends forever.
Be brave, me... If there's no topic, just make one.
If I use one of the rock-solid conversation starters Sitara taught me for times like these...
U-um... Would you like to play a game of Shiritori?
Shiritori? No, I'm... not really interested.
Hyah!
Rejected in one hit... Sitara... It wasn't rock-solid at all...
B-but, I'm still fine. It's just a flesh wound.
In fighting game terms, I just gave the first-strike advantage away.
The match isn't over yet, Mai. Fight on...
...Hey, are you alright? You don't look too well.
Hyaah!
She's going for a chain combo!?
I-I'm fine... You're just... imagining it.
Yes! This reply should cancel that perfectly...
I-I'm not gonna run...! I'm gonna be brave and get right into melee range.
Um... Should I go make some coffee for us?
I'm good. Don't want to have to take a trip to the ladies' room mid-mission.
She's so conscious of herself...! What a serious girl.
And... I'm a grandma's girl, so I'm more comfortable with green tea.
Hyaaah!
She shot me down with "grandma," the invincible anti-air!?
Don't tell me, are all of my attacks getting read?
If you don't mind tea, want me to make some?
...Wait, Mai? Are you really alright? You seem kinda weird.
I-it's... nothing, I'll... I'll be fine.
The cool Rei is strong, both in attacking and defending!
Even though I'm already in red HP, she...
Not good... Panicking would cost me the match. I have to turn this around somehow...
...Oh yeah!
I'm sure the Commander would create an opening for me!
Mai turns to you.
U-um... Commander, everyone's... really late today, aren't they?

commands.command: Nah, this is pretty usual.

items.text: I-I see...
I'm sorry, Commander... It's all my fault...
If only I'd brought up a better topic for you to bounce off of...

commands.command: Are you saying that nobody likes me around here?

items.text: Hyaaah! Th-that's not what I...
How could the support attack fail so horribly...
You're not hated, Commander. You're not hated at all...
Wh-what do I do... It feels like I just got another problem to deal with...

chara_Nikotama-Mai_4-1.text: It's my fault for even leaning on the Commander in the first place, isn't it...
And I knew from the start that going for a heal item would've exposed me...
I don't think I can hold on for much longer... At this point, I've no choice but to mark round one as a loss and get some distance...
Nikotama Mai, she who worries, becomes hurt, and struggles fiercely, all within herself...
Her deathly conflict continues to unfold, with her colleagues none the wiser...

chara_Nikotama-Mai_4-2.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Incredibly... Nikotama Mai's internal struggle continues still.
It's just me and Rei on standby right now...
If it keeps on being this quiet, I wouldn't know what to do...
Someone come! Please!
Ask, and you shall receive...
Good work.
Here's Fumika!
I can feel it! The power from beyond...!
U-um, I'm so glad... you're here on standby too... Fumika.
Eh? I'm not, though... I'm only here to check if we had any remaining office work to take care of.
...Huh?
We have finals at Seiou starting next week, so I won't be able to show up for a while.
Fumika turns to you.
Commander, is there any paperwork you would like me to take care of while I'm here?

commands.command: Not that I'm aware of.

items.text: Alright.
C-Commander, that instant reply was so cruel...

commands.command: I'll deal with it. Good luck with your exams.

items.text: That does make me slightly worried, but... if you say so. Thank you.
I can't believe the Commander's kindness would backfire here of all places...

chara_Nikotama-Mai_4-2.text: I'll excuse myself here then. Take care.
Fumika leaves.
T-the heavens have forsaken me...
My super gauge is completely empty, and my HP is almost all gone too...
Ah! Wait...
I might've let Rei see my relieved face when Fumika came in...
Ahhh, she's definitely not happy. Those are the eyes of someone with a maxed-out anger gauge...
Rei turns to look at Mai.
Uuuuh... Don't stare at me so much...
I'll take a game over at this point!
The office receives a transmission.
Oh. Looks like we've got a job, Commander.
Let's go, Mai.
Hyaaah!
A bait at this kind of timing!? I can't tell if I'm winning or losing!
...Are you not feeling well after all? Better rest up then.
What's this sudden kindness from Rei...!? It's so tough to deal with!
If she presses her advantage here, then I...
I-I'm so sorry! I... can't do it after all!
Ah... Give me a minute.
Rei comes to you.
Commander... Looks like Mai isn't doing well. Can you call a replacement?
If nobody comes, I can manage by myself.
No, uh... I... can sortie fine.
Huh, you can? You're not forcing yourself?
You should let us take care of you if things are hard.
Y-yeah...
I'm guessing that unfamiliar Suit's making you feel uneasy?
If it does get dangerous, I'll back you up.
She's not even older than me, but she's so big-hearted...
My heart might've just skipped a beat...
Whatever the circumstances, Mai and Rei had brought their hearts closer to each other, for a moment.
As the curtains closed on her struggle, she could feel that she had grown just a little.
...Though, I still think Rei would make a good bottom...

chara_Nikotama-Mai_4-3.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
With her new personal Combat Suit, Nikotama Mai is enjoying one success after another.
Five takedowns in just today's sorties. You've been on a roll lately, Mai.
I-I'm... used to my personal Suit now...
So... I might've gotten... a bit more confidence.
Um... it's all... thanks to you, Rei.
Eh? I didn't do anything though.
Ah, no. Just... taking to myself.
Maybe... maybe all I had to do was try.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Um... C-Commander...
I've... built up some confidence.
Erm... how do I put this... I feel like I can fly even higher now...
I guess this is how mother birds feel when they watch their chicks leave the nest.
So Mai's finally caught up to our level now.
Pitiful Yumi...
To think she never even noticed that she's been lapped, let alone passed...
Listen, Mai.
Don't become like a certain someone who only grows in the mouth and chest year after year.
"Only"? What do you mean "Only"!?
Oh, but I didn't say a single word about you, Sitara. Unless... you're actually self-aware?
Ugh! S-she baited me!
I-I'll... do my best.
Right now... I'm not scared of anything.
Tama-chan...
I uh, have to go take care of Suit maintenance, so... I'll see you all later.
Mai leaves...
Looks like her confidence and the performance of her personal Suit are building on each other.
So she's on a high right now, you think?
Didn't know she could get so trigger-happy, er, "suit-happy"...
Just how far are you trying to go, Tama-chan?
Let's leave her be, more interesting that way.
