What happened to the whole "mother bird" thing!?
Despite her friends' worries, Nikotama Mai's successes continued.
But little did she know that a sudden pitfall was awaiting her.
In a sortie one day...
What is this feeling...? Something's not right...
It's different from before... But where...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
After the sortie...
U-umm... Commander... Thanks for coming.
M-my personal Suit is being weird.
So...
Can I... ask for some of your time...? To visit Engineering together...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Yer Suit's actin' up?
Um... Er... Something about it... feels wrong...
Wrong...? Where? And how?
I-I can't put it into words, but it feels like... it's not performing well...
As an engineer I've done a good enough job to feed myself fer the last few decades.
I don't do half-assed maintenance, and I don't leave problems be. Not on my life.
And the settings on that Suit 're tightly fit to yer data.
I-I'm not... doubting your work, Mister Iwata...
But...
I've a good guess on what yer thinkin'.
Yer want an overhaul just in case, right?
Well, lots o' folks get real excited when they get their hands on a new-model suit, I get it.
Iwata goes back to work...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
A few days later...
I've heard all about it, Mai.
Just what do you think you're trying to do!?
Er... Wh-what I'm trying to do...?
Mister Iwata's skill is guaranteed.
He even managed to complete my Suit flawlessly, down to every last demand.
Do you seriously have complaints for an engineer as perfect as him?
B-but I... wasn't complaining...
Then what were you doing? Trying to blame your own weakness on others?
If you can't even back yourself up, your claim is either a figment of your imagination or an excuse for your own failings.
A-are you... doubting me too, Commander?

commands.command: I believe what Mai says.

items.text: Commander... Thank you... so much.
You do realize that you're simply setting yourself up for embarrassment later, yes, Commander?
I suggest you compare Mister Iwata and Mai, and do some proper thinking with that head of yours.

commands.command: Pretty sure Mister Iwata's in the right here.

items.text: A sound judgement indeed.
There simply cannot be a perspective in which Mister Iwata is wrong.

commands.command: It's hard to make a choice between duty and love.

items.text: Hyaaah!
"Love"? How dare you answer with this nonsense!
I swear to god...
Time and time again, you try to hide your own indecisiveness, just like right now.
L-love...

chara_Nikotama-Mai_4-3.text: B-but... I...
If you have something to say, then spit it out! And be clear!
Mai trods away in silence...
Hmph... She's surprisingly stubborn, too.
Ayaka turns to you.
I'm sure you at least realize that there's also strength in admitting one's mistakes?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Meanwhile...
G-Gramps! Have a look at this!
Huh? Wha's goin' on?
So I was looking through Mai's data, and...
Her Emission output and reaction time are both quite a bit better than when we last checked the other day.

Well, yeah, that's what a bit of growin' does.
...Lemme see that.
We'd be fools if our adjustments didn't care 'bout those kinda things.
Iwata notices something.
Wh-what the...
Her personal Suit's settings are based on old data, so...
And the limiter activation count too... Here, look at this.
Tsk, we've done screwed up...
If I were to guess about Mai...
I wonder if she can tell the subtle load differences on her muscles,
and the very slight fluctuations in Suit behavior, all by feeling.
So she can even catch milliunit-level output differences, with just 'er body...
And she was tryin' 'er damnedest t' tell us...
Sorry, it took me too long to notice the data changes...
Nah, 's my fault for not seein' this sooner.
And... I even assumed what she was thinkin', without lendin' an ear t' what she actually wanted t' say.
I dunno if she hid that sense back in the early tests,
but that ain't somethin' just anyone could pull off. Sign of her growth right there.
Either way.
Turns out wha' I'd taken t' be a gentle swan s'really a bird o' prey.
...I'm gonna go apologize to the lass.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
After the truth was revealed...
I-I'm not going to apologize.
I mean, it's Mai's fault for not properly explaining herself.
Yeeeah, that sounds just like her.
Even if she thought she was right,
she'd keep quiet just so she doesn't end up hurting someone else.
H-how was I supposed to know that!?
I haven't known her for as long as you, Sitara.
And plus... She clammed up at the moment where she most needed to explain. I could never have understood her.
...In any case, I've done nothing wrong, and thus I have nothing to apologize for.
Well, I doubt Tama-chan would care about that anyways.
...Is that true now?
If you're curious, why not go take a peek into training room?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Training Gym
If I explained myself more properly back then...
The people at Engineering probably would've gotten what I meant...
I'm sure Mister Iwata always makes sure to keep my equipment in top condition.
I can't let him down. I have to do even better...
And so, Mai starts to practice ballet positions...
Pay even more attention to my body's core than I've been doing...
Refine my physical abilities, until I can become one with the new Suit at an even higher level.
Maybe... I won't be able to do it today...
But in the future... I'm sure I can make it happen...
Slowly but surely, be it in steps or half-steps,
Mai's growth continues today, one bit at a time.

chara_Nikotama-Mai_AN-1.text: Well played. Thank you for the game.
Sitara and Ginny seem to be taking their time outside, aren't they...?
When Sitara picks her ice cream at the convenience store,
she hurries if she's together with us, to not keep us waiting.
But she actually likes to take her time with it, so...
And Ginny has a similar thing with her daily runs.
If we're there exercising together, then she just does the running part.
But since she's by herself, I'm guessing she's doing pull-ups at the park right about now.
With all of us, we'd need to take breaks in the middle,
but if we do, then she doesn't get enough upper-body workout in.
I can see that you understand everyone very well. Your careful observations are impressive.
No, I mean... That seems, ah, pretty normal?
From what you have seen, what kind of person do you suppose I am?
We, uh, haven't been together for too long, so,
In that case, I hope you will continue our friendship from now on, so that we may get to know each other.
Ah, yeah. That, goes without saying.
Now, what say we have another match?

chara_Nikotama-Mai_FA-1.text: One evening, a blissful Mai emerges from a downtown theater after watching a ballet performance.
The Swanhilda...
And the Coppélius...
All amazing...
Her friends and family follow behind her.
Mai truly does enjoy ballet, doesn't she?
Ahaha~ Yeah, she's been like that ever since the performance ended.
Weeell, I get it.
In front of something you really like, your vocab tends to just go, poof!
I do apologize for my daughter being like this.
Ah, nonono, there's nothing you need to be sorry for.
Mai~
How much longer are you going to space out for? Everyone's waiting on you~
We still have to go for dinner~
Mai comes to her senses.
S-sorry!
Sitara, Ginny and Fatima laugh. All in good fun.
The group arrives at a fancy restaurant and sits down for dinner.
Thank you, everyone, for coming with me today.
I gave the invite out of the blue, so... I was worried I might've bothered you all.
Nah, not one bit.
In fact, it was super good!
Ginny agrees.
The ballet company was quite worthy of their name as the pride of the England Shard's royal family, I must say.
Mai chuckles.
I should ask though. You sure about this?
Hm? About what?
I mean, you took us to see such an amazing performance and all.
Yeah, that. At least let us pay for our own tickets.
Ah...
No, don't worry about it.
The tickets were free from Daddy's job anyways.
And he suddenly had something to do, so we weren't sure if we were gonna get to use them at all.
I'm glad we managed to keep the tickets from going to waste, all thanks to everyone here.
I do hope the show was to your liking.

Well–
It sure was. Best thing I've ever seen!
See... Before tonight, I always thought ballet had a pretty high barrier to entry.
But after learning about it from an expert's point of view, that turned out to be, like, completely wrong!
Like, it's actually really entertaining.
Yeah.
The show was beautiful, but at the same time comedic. It was fun to watch.
Coppélia was a ballet unlike any of the others before it.
With its brightness and cheerful tone, it earned the title of "romantic comedy" at the time.
From the comical performance to the gorgeous Mazurka, it's all... wonderful...
Another thing for me personally, I liked how it ended on a happy note.
Different choreographers interpret the Finale differently, but...
I agree with you, Sitara.
I like the version of Coppélia with the bold and clear happy ending, too...
I once heard that Coppélia was the magnum opus of Delibes, the father of French Ballet music. After this enjoyable night, I cannot help but agree.
Yeah, exactly.
There are stories about how the premiere had put the pride of the Théâtre Impérial de l'Opéra on the line.
And how the production took three whole years. Makes you wonder just how much work they put into everything.
Mai~ Chatting is good and all, but don't forget about the food~
S-sorry!
Fatima laughs, and the meal continues.
After the dinner...
All right, it's about time we headed home.
Ah. Would you like me to give you rides?
No, we have arranged to be picked up.
I will take the responsibility of sending Sitara and Ginny home through my means.
Hence, your feelings are appreciated, but we will be fine.
I see. Then please do, and do be careful on the road.
Thank you for today. I had tons of fun.
No worries. And I should also be thanking you for always taking care of Mai.
As her parent, I am truly grateful.
Anyways, I'll see you tomorrow, Tama-chan~
Thanks again for coming, everyone.
See you tomorrow.
Sitara, Ginny and Fatima leave for the night.
You have made some wonderful friends.
I'm glad that today was enjoyable for them.
Yeah.
The next day, at school...
Wait, huh. Tama-tama's videos are up again.
"Tama-tama"...?
There was that video of someone dancing to Zo-san's song a while back, right?
And the dancer in that video went viral back then, remember? That's her.
Ah yeah, definitely watched that. We haven't heard a thing from her lately, huh.
She deleted her channel. Hm, I wonder if this means she's coming back. Wow, I'd like that.
Elsewhere in the classroom, Mai and Co overhears this conversation...
Huh...? Wh-why...?
Looks like some past Tama-tama clips got reuploaded by someone.
Sitara thinks to herself...
Damn... So this IS that thing after all...
Meanwhile, Mai dissociates...
Why would they... do that...?
Hm? Yeah... I wonder why...?
...Ah, crap. It's block five next.

I uh, gotta get going.
...See you guys later.
Sitara runs off for class...
Hey~ Careful you don't trip~
Virginia turns to check on Mai.
...Something the matter?
But she doesn't react...
Am I... dreaming?
Will I... be lying in my bed, when I wake up...?
Mai...?

chara_Nikotama-Mai_FA-2.text: Mai's dissociation continues...
Is this... a lucid dream...? Where... am I right now? My room? Sitara's place?
Mai... You alright?
Mai comes to.
Ah... I... guess not... It's the real Ginny, huh...
Ah, yeah, I'm real. Or so I think anyways.
The videos... videos? Why...?
Ah, you mean Tama-tama's vids?
Probably uploaded by someone who saved the footage, I'd say?
I mean, the person deleted their own channel and all.
You're... probably right...
Well, something that's been uploaded once can't be erased off the internet so easily.
And past mistakes... those won't just be forgotten either, huh.
...I don't know about that one.
Even if the past can't be undone,
it really depends on how one accepts it... Er, I also want to believe that it can be sometimes, but.
Mai looks to Ginny.
...Well,
it probably wouldn't feel too good for the person if they found out.
...Yeah.
Well... probably.
But, this... Why now, after so long...?
And, there's the one with Zo-san's song too...
The circle of trouble just keeps growing, larger and larger, larger and larger...
...You seem to care a lot about-
Not that I really care about this.
Ah... okay. Right, my bad.
...Y'know, if you've got something on your mind, I uh, wouldn't mind hearing you out...?
And if you can't talk to me, there's Sitara, and Fatima too.
Or like, maybe a teacher... Oh and, I bet the Commander can lend you an ear too, right?
...What... do you mean by that?
Do I look worried about something?
What are you trying to do here?
Huh?
Uh... Well, I mean...
Did you notice something about me? You've always been so considerate, Ginny.
No, well... I didn't... You know what, I'm sorry. Really.
I wasn't thinking when I said that.
Sorry. I was just taking it out on you. I'm the worst...
Not at all. I don't mind.
So kind... You're so kind, Ginny.
You should probably stay away from me right now.
Mai turns around...
I'm gonna go be alone for a bit.
Sorry again, for being so unpleasant.
...and leaves the classroom.
Not at all...
...I don't mind it at all, Mai.
Nikotama Dance Studio
Later that evening, Sitara messages Mai through Sentan Chat...
Sorry we couldn't head home together today~
But hear this, iunno why but Ginny's got an apology for you
She was like "I didn't mean anything bad but I've got no clue how to tell her that help me~"
Was pretty interesting seeing her ask me for help so weak like, sure don't see that every day~
Sorry, it's a misunderstanding, you've got it all wrong.
It was my bad, I'll give Ginny a proper apology.
So if you can pass on a word to her for me.
"Sorry for all the trouble from someone like me." Just that, thanks.
Roger dodger!
I even got Sitara to worry...
What am I even doing...
Mai's mother walks in and finds Mai, alone, in the dance studio.
Ah~ So you're still here.
Hyaaah!?
I was thinking about tidying up the studio, but...
Ah... Yeah. Just a bit longer... I just wanted to practice for, just a bit longer...
I'll... do the tidying, so, if you'd let me stay for...
Alright~ I'll leave it to you then~
Mai's mother leaves.
...*sigh*
As Mai sighs to herself, the line between reality and hallucination begins to blur...
Ah, Mommy, so kind and wonderful...
If only she didn't have a defective daughter.
"Oh, I sure wish I wasn't stuck with such an annoying child."
...She wouldn't think those things.
Yeah. If nothing else, the blood relationship is there.
Of course she wouldn't be willing to admit that her daughter is a failure.
But what about the others?
"Aw, hell, I was so looking forward to a fun high school life, but I just had to get involved with this weirdo~"
"Just one more year... Guess I gotta deal with it~"
"I could be having so much fun together with Sitara, if only that wasn't also here."
"She's annoying, and I can't even describe how painful spending time alone with her is."
She's not the kind of person to have those kind of thoughts.
Just one more year until they'll be free from you. Until they never have to meet you again.
Come on now, desperately butter up to them, don't get shaken loose...
It's not like that!
Don't worry, at least you'll always have me on your side.
The voice whispers to Mai's ear...
And there is a way for you to finally stop being a bother to others. It'd even put an end to your own suffering.
How about I tell it to you?

chara_Nikotama-Mai_FA-3.text: Don't worry, at least you'll always have me on your side.
The voice whispers to Mai's ear...
And there is a way for you to finally stop being a bother to others. It'd even put an end to your own suffering.
How about I tell it to you?
A notification suddenly pops up on Mai's phone.
Sitara...?
Oh by the way, that Tama-tama clip that got uploaded today
I saw it, well just a bit
I mean I know it wasn't good to do that and all
I was just wondering who put it up and I caught a glimpse of the vid while I was looking into that
It really is pretty good, remember that one time when you and your mom taught me a lot about dancing?
Weeell that let me savor the vid even more you could say
Oh crap just look at the time. I gotta get some sleep, gnight~!
Good night.
You know, maybe Ginny's noticed that Tama-tama is you.
And maybe she told Sitara?
That would certainly explain what she just sent you on SenChat.
Those messages saying "Hey, how long are you gonna keep lying for?"
...Sitara wouldn't play awful mind games like that.
Oh, really? I mean, it's Sitara we're talking about here.
You know that name of ours, from our beloved Daddy and Mommy.
The name that describes our dancing skills so well.
The name that weighs so heavily on you, the failure who could never live up to it.
Whenever Sitara accidentally calls you by that name, your expression strains, just a bit.
But she's sharp enough to have noticed it since the very start, remember?
There's nothing about you that I don't know.
Or maybe it was the Commander over at the company who told her.
The Commander wouldn't just spill other people's secrets like that!
But can you really trust an adult?
Stop saying whatever you want...!
It's okay... It doesn't matter what people think of me, or who these people are.
I believe in myself, and nobody can change that...
So, whatever others are thinking about me, none of that matters...!
Get out of my head already!
Ah... And here I was, trying to be your friend...
Go away!
Even though I'm the only one who's always on your side...
The voice fades away, leaving Mai alone in the silence...
The next day, at school...
Ah... Sitara, good mor-

*yawn*...
Crap... So sleepy...
You all right?
Weeell, I shooould hold up if I take a small nap during break.
Not enough sleep...?
Remember those Tama-tama vids that got uploaded without permission?
Ah... Yeah.
I get how happy you feel to see a vid you wanted to watch get put up.
But it's really not good to reupload other people's clips without asking first, yeah?
Soooo I went and reported those vids.
There was a bit of back-and-forth with the staff, and it ended up taking a while.
But I'll say, they're pre-tty legendary for responding so soon.
Though there might've been reports from other people too.
Weeell, the uploader was also a fan of Tama-tama's.
Sitara slowly succumbs to her drowsiness...
So it all went pretty smooth, which I guess was good...
Bleh, my head's spinning... I need a bit of shuteye...
S-Sitara.
Mm?
Ah... Er, I mean...
Have a good rest.
Mhm... Mmn, gnight~
Sitara dozes off. Mai watches her rest with a warm smile.
Mai reflects upon herself...
As she does, she recalls various scenes of her life...
She thinks back to the fun times of Tri-Stella☆'s afterschool karaoke gathering...
Mai: I still can't find it in me to face the past.
Mai: I never could, not with all the dreams and delusions I distract myself with.
She thinks back to when she and Ginny visited a family restaurant together...
Mai: From inside the mask I wear, what do my two eyes see?
She thinks to the present, where she is alone in her family's dance studio...
A beautiful world. One without me.
Nathanael may have shattered his skull on the pavement, dying without overcoming his fears.
She turns around, and thinks back to her days as Tama-tama, dancing in this very studio...
But if I can be better than him, change my point of view...
She thinks back to Ginny's recent advice...
Even if the past can't be undone,
it really depends on how one accepts it... Er, I also want to believe that it can be sometimes, but.
In her memories, Tama-tama dances...
Mai: Like how Der Sandmann became Coppélia.
And dances...
Mai: And like how Coppélia became a comedy.
And dances...
Mai: What do I want to see myself become?
Trying to become someone you're not?
You'll be broken, shattered into pieces, and you'll never get back up again.
After the chilling warning, the voice fades away, seemingly for a final time...
...We don't know that yet.
And Mai starts to dance in the present...
Mai: My dance continues, now and forever.
